analyzed: asikkhi iti vā sikkhitaḥ tathā hi kattu ppayogaḥ dissati aham kho pana su sikkhitaḥ anavayaḥ

analyzed: sake ācariyake kumbhakāra kamma iti

analyzed: liṅgati liṅganam ulliṅgati ulliṅganam taṅgati taṅganam saṅgati saṅganam tattha

analyzed: ragi saṅkāyam raṅgati

analyzed: gu sadde gavati

original: Ghakārantadhātu
analyzed: ghakāra anta dhātu

original: Ghā gandhopādāne. Ghāti. Ghānaṃ. Gandhaṃ ghatvā. Atrāyaṃ pāḷi “gandhaṃ ghatvā sati muṭṭhā”ti. Etissā pana divādigaṇaṃ pattāya “ghāyati ghāyitvā”ti rūpāni bhavanti.

original: Ghu abhigamane. Abhigamanaṃ adhigamanaṃ. Ghoti.
analyzed: abhigamane abhigamanam adhigamanam

original: Taggha pālane. Tagghati.
analyzed: taggha pālane tagghati

analyzed: ghu sadde ghoti ghavati

original: Raghi laghi gatyakkhepe. Gatyakkhepo gatiyā akkhepo. Raṅghati, laṅghati, ullaṅghati. Laṅghitā, ullaṅghikāpīti, laṅghitvā.

original: Maghi ketave ca. Cakāro pubbatthāpekkho. Maṅghati.

original: Rāgha lāgha sāmatthiye. Rāghati. Lāghati.

original: Dāgha āyāse ca. Āyāso kilamanaṃ. Cakāro sāmatthiyāpekkhako. Dāghati. Nidāgho.

original: Silāgha katthane. Katthanaṃ pasaṃsanaṃ. Silāghati. Silāghā. Buddhassa silāghate. Silāghitvā. “Attanobhāsā”ti saddasatthavidū vadanti.
analyzed: silāgha katthane katthanam pasaṃsanam silāghati silāghā buddhassa silāghate silāghitvā attano bhāsā ati sadda sattha vidū vadanti

original: Gha kārantadhāturūpāni.
analyzed: gha kāra anta dhātu rūpāni

original: Iti bhūvādāgaṇe kavaggantadhāturūpāni
analyzed: iti bhū vā āda gaṇe ka vak ganta dhātu rūpāni

original: Samattāni.
analyzed: samattāni

original: Cakārantadhātu
analyzed: cakār anta dhātu

original: Idāni cavaggantadhāturūpāni vuccante –
analyzed: idāni ca vak ga anta dhātu rūpāni vuccante

analyzed: suca soke socati sokaḥ socanā socam socantau socantam kulam socitvā

analyzed: kuca sadde tāre tāra saddo accucca saddo kocati ucca saddam karoti iti attho

original: Kuñca koṭilla’ppībhāvesu. Kuñcati. Kuñcikā, kuñcitakeso. Kuñcitvā.
analyzed: kuñca koṭillappī bhāvesu kuñcati kuñcikā kuñcita kesaḥ kuñcitvā

original: Añcu gatipūjanāsu. Maggaṃ añcati. Buddhaṃ añcati. Uddhaṃ anuggantvā tiriyaṃ añcitoti tiracchāno. Kaṭukañcukatā.
analyzed: gati pūjanāsu maggam añcati buddham añcati uddham anuggantvā tiriyam kaṭu kañcuka tā

original: Vañcu cañcu tañcu gatiyaṃ. Vañcati. Cañcati. Tañcati. Mañcati. Santi pādā avañcanā. Avañcanāti vañcituṃ gantuṃ asamatthā.

analyzed: theyya karaṇe thenanam theyyam corikā tassa kriyā theyya karaṇam gocati gaṇecati

original: Acca pūjāyaṃ accati. Brahmāsurasuraccito.
analyzed: acca pūjā ayam brahma asura sura cito

original: Tacca hiṃsāyaṃ. Taccati.
analyzed: tat ca hiṃsā ayam tat ca ti

original: Cacca jacca paribhāsanavajjanesu. Caccati. Jaccati.
analyzed: paribhāsanavat janesu

original: Kuca saṃpaccanakoṭillapaṭikkamavilekhanesu. Kucati, saṅkucati. Saṅkoco.

original: Taca saṃvaraṇe. Saṃvaraṇaṃ rakkhaṇaṃ. Tacati. Taco.
analyzed: saṃvaraṇe saṃvaraṇam rakkhaṇam tacati taco

original: Dica thutiyaṃ. Dicati.
analyzed: dica thutiyam dicati

original: Kuca saṅkocane. Kocati, saṅkocati. Saṅkoco.
analyzed: kuca saṅkocane kocati saṅkocati saṅkocaḥ

original: Byāca byājikaraṇe. Byājikaraṇaṃ byājikriyā. Byācati.

original: Kaca bandhane. Kacati.

original: Īja gatiyaṃ. Ījati.

analyzed: tejano tejo tattha tejanoti kaṇḍo saro usu tejoti sūriyaḥ atha vā tejoti tejanam

original: Sañja parissagge, āliṅganaṃ parissaggo. Sañjati.

original: Ma’hā’rāja mahārāja, mahārāja mameva’hi;

analyzed: raji nāgaḥ dantehi bhūmim rañjati ārañjati ettha ca tathāgata rañjitam

original: Veṇu ñāṇacintānisāmanesu. Veṇati.
analyzed: veṇu ñāṇa cintā nisā manesu veṇati

original: Pīṇa pīṇane. Pīṇanaṃ paripuṇṇatā. Pīṇati. Pīṇo divā na bhuñjati, pīṇorakkhaṃsabāhu.
analyzed: pīṇa pīṇane pīṇanam paripuṇṇa tā pīṇati pīṇaḥ divā na bhuñjati

original: Miṇa hiṃsāyaṃ. Miṇati.
analyzed: miṇa hiṃsa ayam miṇati

original: Duṇa gatiyañca. Hiṃsāpekkhako cakāro. Duṇati.
analyzed: gatiyam ca hiṃsā apekkhakaḥ cakāraḥ duṇati

original: Saṇa abyattasadde. Saṇati. Saṇateva brahmāraññaṃ. Saṇatevāti nadati viya.
analyzed: abyatta sadde saṇati saṇatā iva brahmā araññam saṇatā iva ati nadati viya

original: Tuṇa koṭille. Toṇati.
analyzed: tuṇa koṭille toṇati

original: Puṇa nipuṇe. Puṇati, nipuṇati. Nipuṇadhammo. Ettha ca nipuṇasaṇhasukhumasaddā vevacanasaddā kusalachekadakkhasaddā viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: nipuṇe puṇati nipuṇati nipuṇa dhammaḥ ettha ca nipuṇa saṇha sukhuma saddā vevacana saddā kusala cheka dakkha saddā viyā ti daṭṭhabbam

original: Muṇa paṭiññāṇe. Muṇati.
analyzed: muṇa paṭiññāṇe muṇati

original: Kuṇa saddopakaraṇe. Koṇati.
analyzed: kuṇa sadda upakaraṇe koṇati

original: Cuṇa chedane. Coṇati.
analyzed: cuṇa chedane coṇati

original: Maṇa cāge. Veraṃ maṇatīti veramaṇi.
analyzed: maṇa cāge veram maṇati iti veramaṇi

original: Phuṇa vikiraṇe vidhunane ca. Phuṇati. Aṅgārakāsuṃ apare phuṇanti.
analyzed: phuṇa vikiraṇe vidhunane ca phuṇati aṅgārakāsum apare phuṇanti

original: Imāni ṇakārantadhāturūpāni.
analyzed: imāni ṇakāra anta dhātu rūpāni

original: Iti bhūvādigaṇe ṭavaggantadhāturūpāni
analyzed: iti bhū ādi gaṇe ṭa vak ganta dhātu rūpāni

original: Samattāni.
analyzed: samattāni

original: Takārantadhātu
analyzed: takāra anta dhātu

original: Atha tavaggantadhāturūpāni vuccante –
analyzed: atha tavak ganta dhātu rūpāni vuccante

analyzed: te pālane pālanam rakkhaṇam tāyati tāṇam gottam nakkhattam aghassa tātā kicchena adhigatā

original: bhogā, te tāto vidhami dhamaṃ. Tattha gottanti gaṃ tāyatīti gottaṃ. “Gotamo kassapo”ti
analyzed: bhogāḥ te tātaḥ vidhami dhamam tattha gottam ti gam tāyati iti gottam gotamaḥ kassapo ti

original: hi ādinā pavattamānaṃ gaṃ vacanaṃ buddhiñca tāyati ekaṃsikavisayatāya rakkhatīti
analyzed: hi ādinā pavattamānam gam vacanam buddhim ca tāyati ekaṃsika visaya tāya rakkhati iti

original: gottaṃ. Yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena atthena vinā na vattati, tathā abhidhānaṃ
analyzed: gottam yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇa bhūtena atthena vinā na vattati tathā abhidhānam

analyzed: abhidheyya bhūtena tasmā saḥ gotta saṅkhāto attho tāni tāyati rakkhati iti vuccati ko

original: pana soti? Aññakulaparamparāsādhāraṇaṃ tassa kulassa ādipurisasammuditaṃ taṃkulapariyāpannasādhāraṇaṃ sāmaññarūpaṃ.
analyzed: pana so ti añña kula paramparā sādhāraṇam tassa kulassa ādi purisa sammuditam taṃ kula pariyāpanna sādhāraṇam sāmañña rūpam

analyzed: nakkhattanti visama gatiyā a gantvā attanaḥ vīthiyā ava gamanena nakkhanam gamanam tāyati

original: Citi saññāṇe. Saññāṇaṃ cihanaṃ lakkhaṇakaraṇaṃ. Cetati. Cihanaṃ karotīti attho. Īkārantavasena

original: aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu.
analyzed: aññesu pi īdisesu ṭhānesu

analyzed: a cinteyyaḥ hi pāḷinayaḥ

original: Cuta āsecane kharaṇe ca. Cotati.

analyzed: ca nānā apavatti nimitta vasena gahetabbaḥ

original: Nivāse ākāre ceva, jātidese ca kāraṇe;
analyzed: nivāse ākāre ca iva jāti dese ca kāraṇe

original: Samosaraṇaṭṭhāne ca, āyatanaravo gato.
analyzed: samosaraṇa ṭṭhāne ca āyatana ravaḥ gato

analyzed: na seve lokāyatikam na itam paññāya vaḍḍhanan ti āha āyatim hitam tena lokaḥ na yatati

analyzed: cittam pi na uppādenti aññattha api hi evam vuttam kāko setaḥ aṭṭhīnam

original: paṭisedhakaṃ vitaṇḍasatthasippa”nti.
analyzed: paṭisedhakam vitaṇḍa sattha sippanti

original: Yuta juta bhāsane. Bhāsanaṃ udīraṇaṃ. Yotati. Jotati.

original: Jutadittiyaṃ. Jotati, vijjotati. Juti, joti. Kārite “joteti, jotayitvāna saddhamma”nti

original: ceta sirimāvimāna vatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “jotīti candimasūriyanakkhattatārakānaṃ sādhāraṇanāma”nti.

original: Atha vā “joti jotiparāyaṇo”ti vacanato yo koci jotati khattiyakulādīsu jātattā ca

original: rūpasobhāyuttattā ca, so “jotī”ti vuccati.
analyzed: ca saḥ jotī iti vuccati

original: Sita vaṇṇo. Sitadhātu setavaṇṇe vattati. Kiñcāpettha vaṇṇasāmaññaṃ vuttaṃ, tathāpi

analyzed: idha nīla pīta ādīsu seta vaṇṇaḥ yā iva gahetabbo payoga dassana vasena setati setam vattham

original: Vāccaliṅgattā pana setasaddo tiliṅgo gahetabbo.
analyzed: vāccaliṅga ttā pana sa ita saddaḥ ti liṅgaḥ gahetabbo

original: Setaṃ sitaṃ suci sukkaṃ, paṇḍaraṃ dhavalampi ca;
analyzed: setam sitam suci sukkam paṇḍaram dhavalam pi ca

original: Akaṇhaṃ goramodātaṃ, setanāmāni honti hi.
analyzed: a kaṇham goramodātam seta nāmāni honti hi

original: Vatu vattane. Vattati, pavattati, saṃvattati, anuvattati, parivattati. Pavattaṃ.
analyzed: vatu vattane vattati pavattati saṃvattati anuvattati parivattati pavattam

original: Kilota addabhāve. Addabhāvo tintabhāvo. Kilotati, pakilotati, temetīti attho. Kārite pakiloteti, pakilotayati. Uṇhodakasmiṃ pakilotayitvā, temetvāti attho.
analyzed: kilota adda bhāve adda bhāvaḥ tinta bhāvaḥ kilotati pakilotati temeti iti attho kārite pakilota iti pakilotayati uṇha udakasmiṃ pakilotayitvā temetvā ati attho

original: Vata yācane. Vatati.
analyzed: vata yācane vatati

original: Kita ñāṇe. Ketati. Ketanaṃ, ketako, saṅketo.
analyzed: kitaḥ ñāṇe ketati ketanam ketakaḥ saṅketaḥ

original: Kati suttajanane. Suttaṃ kantati.

original: Patha gatiyaṃ. Pathati. Patho. Pathoti maggo. So duvidho mahājanena padasā paṭipajjitabbo
analyzed: gatiyam pathati patho patho ti maggo so duvidhaḥ mahājanena padasā paṭipajjitabbo

original: pakatimaggo ca paṇḍitehinibbānatthikehi paṭipajjitabbo paṭipadāsaṅkhāto ariyamaggo
analyzed: pakati maggaḥ ca paṇḍitehi nibbānatthikehi paṭipajjitabbaḥ paṭipadā saṅkhātaḥ ariya maggaḥ

original: cāti. Tattha pakatimaggo uppannakiccākiccehi janehi pathiyati gacchiyatīti patho,
analyzed: ca ati tattha pakati maggaḥ uppanna kicca akiccehi janehi

original: paṭipadā pana amatamahāpuraṃ gantukāmehi kulaputtehi saddhāpātheyyaṃ gahetvā pathiyati
analyzed: paṭipadā pana amatamahāpuram gantu kāmehi kula puttehi saddhā pātheyyam gahetvā pathiyati

original: paṭipajjiyatīti patho. Atha vā pātheti kārakaṃ puggalaṃ gameti nibbānaṃ sampāpetīti
analyzed: paṭipajjiyati iti pathaḥ atha vā pātheti kārakam puggalam gameti nibbānam sampāpeti iti

original: vā patho, paṭipadāyeva. Maggābhidhānaṃ curādigaṇe maggadhātukathanaṭṭhāne kathessāma.
analyzed: vā patho paṭipadāya iva magga abhidhānam curādi gaṇe magga dhātu kathana ṭṭhāne kathessāma

original: Katha nippāke. Kathati.
analyzed: nippāke kathati

original: Matha vilothane. Mathati.
analyzed: matha vilothane mathati

original: Potha pariyāyanabhāve. Pothati. Pothako. Pothetīti ayaṃ curādigaṇepi vattati. Tena “samantā anupariyeyyuṃ, nippothentā catuddisā”ti payogo dissati.
analyzed: potha pariyāyana bhāve pothati pothako potheti iti ayam curādi gaṇe pi vattati tena samantā anupariyeyyum nippothentā catuddisā iti payogaḥ dissati

original: Gottha vaṃse. Gotthati. Gotthulo, gotthu.
analyzed: vaṃse gotthati gotthulaḥ gotthu

original: Puthu vitthāre. Pothati. Puthavī.
analyzed: puthu vitthāre pothati puthavī

original: Thakārantadhāturūpāni.
analyzed: thakāra anta dhātu rūpāni

original: Dakārantadhātu
analyzed: dakāra anta dhātu

original: Dā dāne. Āpubbo gahaṇe. Saddho dānaṃ dadāti deti, sīlaṃ ādadāti ādeti. Imāni suddhakattupadāni
analyzed: dā dāne ā pubbaḥ gahaṇe saddhaḥ dānam dadāti deti sīlam ādadāti ādeti imāni suddha kattu padāni

original: taddīpakattā. Saddho assaddhaṃ dānaṃ dāpeti, sīlaṃ ādapeti, samādapeti. Ye dhammamevādapayanti
analyzed: tad dīpaka ttā saddhaḥ assaddham dānam dāpeti sīlam ādapeti samādapeti ye dhammam eva ādapayanti

original: santo. Imāni kāritapadāni hetukattupadānīti ca vuccanti taddīpakattā. Saddhena dānaṃ
analyzed: santaḥ imāni kārita padāni hetu kattu padāni iti ca vuccanti tad dīpaka ttā saddhena dānam

original: dīyati, sīlaṃ ādīyati, samādīyati, imāni kammapadāni taddīpakattā. Ayañca dā dāneti

original: dhātu sāsanānurūpasutivasena divādigaṇaṃ patvā supanakriyaṃ vadanto “dāyati niddāyati
analyzed: dhātu sāsana anurūpa suti vasena divādi gaṇam patvā supana kriyam vadantaḥ

original: niddā”ti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayati. Dānamavakhaṇḍanañca vadanto “diyati
analyzed: niddāti sa nāma padāni suddha kattu padāni janayati dānam avakhaṇḍanañca vadantaḥ diyati

original: dānaṃ dātta”nti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayati. Suddhiṃvadanto “dāyati vedāyati
analyzed: dānam sa nāma padāni suddha kattu padāni janayati suddhiṃvadantaḥ dāyati vedāyati

original: vodāna”nti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayati, imasmiṃ pana bhūvādigaṇe dānaṃ
analyzed: vodānanti sa nāma padāni suddha kattu padāni janayati imasmin pana bhūva ādi gaṇe dānam

analyzed: vadantaḥ ā pubba vasena gahaṇam ca vadantaḥ dadāti deti ādadāti ādeti dānam ādānam iti

original: sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayati. Tathā kucchitagamanaṃ vadanto “dāti suddāti
analyzed: sa nāma padāni suddha kattu padāni janayati tathā kucchita gamanam vadantaḥ dāti suddāti

original: suddo suddī”ti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayatīti ayaṃ viseso daṭṭhabbo. Yathā
analyzed: suddo suddī iti sa nāma padāni suddha kattu padāni janayati iti ayam visesaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ yathā

original: cettha, evamaññatrāpi yathāsambhavaṃ viseso upaparikkhitabbo nayaññūhi.
analyzed: ca ittha evam aññatra api yathāsambhavam visesaḥ upaparikkhitabbaḥ naya ññūhi

original: Idānissa nāmapadāni tumantādīni brūma. “Dānaṃ, deyyaṃ, dātabbaṃ, brahmadeyyaṃ, dinnaṃ,
analyzed: nāma padāni tumanta ādīni brūma dānam deyyam dātabbam brahma deyyam dinnam

original: dāyako, dāyikā, dakkhiṇā” iccādīni, “dātuṃ, padātuṃ, dātave, padātave, datvā, datvāna,
analyzed: dāyakaḥ dāyikā dakkhiṇā iccādīni dātum padātum dātave padātave datvā

original: dadātuna, daditvā, daditvāna, dadiya, dajjā, dadiyāna, ādātuṃ, ādāya, ādiya” iccādīni ca yojetabbāni.
analyzed: dadātuna daditvā daditvāna dadiya dajjā dadiyāna ādātum ādāya ādiya icca ādīni ca yojetabbāni

original: Tattha dānanti dātabbaṃ, dadanti etenāti atthe na deyyadhammo dānacetanā ca vuccati.
analyzed: tattha dānam ti dātabbam dadanti etena ati atthe na deyya dhammaḥ dāna cetanā ca vuccati

original: Kasmā pana tattha dinnasaddoyeva kathiyati, na dattasaddoti? Akathane kāraṇamatthi.
analyzed: kasmā pana tattha dinna saddaḥ yā iva kathiyati na datta saddaḥ ti a kathane kāraṇam atthi

original: “Dānaṃ dinna”ntiādīsu hi dinnasaddaṭṭhāne dattasaddo na dissati, tasmā na kathiyati.
analyzed: dānam dinna nti ādīsu hi dinna sadda ṭṭhāne datta saddaḥ na dissati tasmā na kathiyati

original: Guṇabhūto dattasaddo, na diṭṭho jinabhāsite;
analyzed: guṇa bhūtaḥ datta saddaḥ na diṭṭhaḥ jina bhāsite

original: “Manasā dānaṃ mayā dinnaṃ”, iti dinnapadaṃ viya.
analyzed: manasā dānam mayā dinnam iti dinna padam

original: “Devadatto yaññadatto, datto” iti ca ādiko;
analyzed: devadattaḥ yaññadattaḥ dattaḥ iti ca ādikaḥ

original: Paṇṇattivacane diṭṭho, samāsabyāsato pana.
analyzed: paṇṇatti vacane diṭṭhaḥ samāsa byāsataḥ pana

original: Tasmā “devadatto”tiādīsu “devena dinno”ti samāsaṃ katvā paṇṇattivacanattā dinnasaddassa
analyzed: tasmā devadattaḥ iti ādīsu devena dinnaḥ iti samāsam katvā paṇṇatti vacana ttā dinna saddassa

original: dattādeso kātabbo sāsanānurūpena. Upari hi “dinnassa datto kvaci paṇṇattiya”nti lakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: datta ādeso kātabbo sāsana anurūpena upari hi dinnassa dattaḥ kvaci lakkhaṇam

original: passissatha. Ayameva hi sāsane nīti avilaṅghanīyā. Idaṃ panettha vavatthānaṃ –
analyzed: passissatha ayam eva hi sāsane nīti a vilaṅghanīyā idam pana ittha vavatthānam

original: Sakkaṭe dattasaddova, dinnasaddo na dissati;
analyzed: sakkaṭe datta saddaḥ iva dinna saddaḥ na dissati

original: Byāsamhi dinnasaddova, dattasaddo na pāḷiyaṃ.
analyzed: byāsamhi dinna saddaḥ iva datta saddaḥ na pāḷiyam

original: “Manasā dānaṃ mayā dinnaṃ, dānaṃ dinno”tiādisu;
analyzed: manasā dānam mayā dinnam dānam

original: “Dhammadinnā mahāmāyā”, iccādīsu ca pāḷisu.
analyzed: dhammadinnā mahāmāyā iccādīsu ca pāḷisu

original: Iti byāsasamāsānaṃ, vasā dvedhā pavattati;
analyzed: iti byāsa samāsānam vasā dvedhā pavattati

original: Dinnasaddoti dīpeyya, na so sakkaṭabhāsite.
analyzed: dinna saddo iti dīpeyya na so sakkaṭa bhāsite

original: Guṇabhūto dattasaddo, asamāsamhi kevalo;

original: Na dissati munimate, dinnasaddova kevalo.
analyzed: na dissati muni mate dinna saddaḥ iva kevalaḥ

original: Teneva dinnasaddassa, dattādeso kato mayā;

original: “Dattaṃ sirappadāna”nti, kavayo pana abravuṃ.

original: Ediso pāḷiyaṃ natthi, nayo tasmā na so varo;

original: “Datto”ti bhūridattassa, saññā paṇṇattiyaṃ gatā.
analyzed: datto ti bhūridattassa saññā paṇṇattiyam gatā

original: “Brahmadatto buddhadatto, datto” iti hi sāsane;
analyzed: brahmadattaḥ buddhadattaḥ dattaḥ iti hi sāsane

original: Paṇṇattiyaṃ dattasaddo, asamāsasamāsiko.
analyzed: paṇṇattiyam datta saddaḥ a samāsa samāsikaḥ

original: “Paradattabhojana”nti, evamādīsu pāḷisu;
analyzed: evamādīsu pāḷisu

original: Samāse guṇabhūtoyaṃ, dattasaddo patiṭṭhito.
analyzed: samāse guṇa bhūtaḥ iyam datta saddaḥ patiṭṭhito

original: “Manasā dānaṃ mayā dinnaṃ, dānaṃ dinno”tiādisu;
analyzed: manasā dānam mayā dinnam dānam

original: Guṇabhūto dinnasaddo, asamāsamhi dissati.
analyzed: guṇa bhūtaḥ dinna saddaḥ asamāsamhi dissati

original: “Dinnādāyī dhammadinnā”, iccevamādīsu pana;
analyzed: dinnādāyī dhammadinnā icca evamādīsu pana

original: Samāse guṇapaṇṇatti-bhāvenesa padissati.
analyzed: samāse guṇa paṇṇatti bhāvena isa padissati

original: Koci pana saddasatthavidū garu evaṃ saddaracanamakāsi –
analyzed: koci pana evam

original: “Yassaṅkurehi jimutambujaloditehi,
analyzed: yaḥ saṅkurehi jimu tambu jala uditehi

original: Vāteritehi patitehi suṇehi tehi.
analyzed: vāta īritehi patitehi suṇehi tehi

original: Jenantacīvaramasobhatha brahmadattaṃ,
analyzed: brahmadattam

original: Vandāmi taṃ caladalaṃ varabodhirukkha”nti.
analyzed: vandāmi tam cala dalam

analyzed: ettha ca brahmadattam ti idam sakkaṭa bhāsātaḥ nayam gahetvā vuttam na pāḷitaḥ

original: “brahmadattiya”nti vā “brahmadinna”nti vā “devadattiya”nti vā “devadinna”nti vā rūpena

analyzed: bhavitabbam tathā hi bodhisatto ca maddī ca sammodamānā sakkadattiye assame vasiṃsu iti

analyzed: pāḷi naya anurūpaḥ aṭṭhakathā pāṭhaḥ dissati tasmai ettha evam vadāma

original: “Dattasaddassa ṭhānamhi, “dattiya”nti ravo gato;

original: Devadattiyapatto ca, assamo sakkadattiyo”ti.

original: Ayaṃ nīti sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbā. Atra pana paripuṇṇāparipuṇṇavasena yathārahaṃ padakkamo bhavati.

original: Dadāti, dadanti. Dadāsi, dadātha. Dadāmi, dadāma. Dadātu, dadantu. Dadāhi, dadātha.
analyzed: dadāti dadanti dadāsi dada atha dadāmi dadāma dadātu dadantu dadāhi dada atha

original: Dadāmi, dadāma, dadāmase. Dadeyya, dade, dajjā. Dajjā sappuriso dānaṃ. Dadeyyuṃ,
analyzed: dadāmi dadāma dadāmase dadeyya dade dajjā dajjā sappurisaḥ dānam dadeyyum

original: dajjuṃ. Pitā mātā ca te dajjuṃ. Dadeyyāsi, dajjāsi, dajjesi iccapi. Dajjāsi abhayaṃ

original: Dadeyyāmhe, dajjāmhe. Ayamasmākaṃ khanti. Garūnaṃ pana khanti aññathā bhavati. Tathā hi –

original: Garū “dajjati dajjanti”, itiādinayena tu;

original: animittaṃ dīghabhāvaṃ katvā nipphajjati. Evaṃ sāsanassānurūpo vaṇṇasandhi bhavati.
analyzed: animittam dīgha bhāvam katvā nipphajjati evam vaṇṇa sandhi bhavati

original: Duvidho hi sandhi padasandhi vaṇṇasandhīti. Tesu yattha padacchedo labbhati, so padasandhi.

original: Yathā? Tatrāyaṃ. Yattha pana na labbhati, so vaṇṇasandhi. Yathā? Atrajo. Yathā ca
analyzed: yathā tatra ayam yattha pana na labbhati saḥ vaṇṇa sandhi yathā atrajaḥ yathā ca

original: sugato, yathā ca paddhāni. Evaṃ duvidhesu sandhīsu “dajjā”ti ayaṃ vaṇṇasandhi eva.
analyzed: sugataḥ yathā ca evam duvidhesu sandhīsu dajjāti ayam vaṇṇa sandhi eva

original: Aparopi rūpanayo bhavati tvāpaccayantavasena –
analyzed: aparaḥ api rūpa nayaḥ bhavati

original: “Ayaṃ so indako yakkho, dajjā dānaṃ parittakaṃ;
analyzed: ayam so indakaḥ yakkhaḥ dajjā dānam parittakam

original: Atirocati amhehi, cando tāragaṇe yathā”ti
analyzed: atirocati cando tāra gaṇe yathā ati

analyzed: dassanataḥ ettha hi dajjāti da tvā iti atthaḥ idam pana da tvā saddena samāna attham dadiyya

original: iti padarūpaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā yyakāre pare saralopaṃ katvā saññogesu sarūpalopañca
analyzed: iti pada rūpam patiṭṭhapetvā yyakāre pare sara lopam katvā saññogesu sarūpa lopam ca

original: Athāparopi rūpanayo bhavati kammani yapaccayavasena. Tathā hi “petānaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ
analyzed: atha aparaḥ api rūpa nayaḥ bhavati kammani ya paccaya vasena tathā hi petānam dakkhiṇam

original: dajjā”ti ca “dakkhiṇā dajjā”ti ca dve pāṭhā dissanti. Tattha pacchimassa dajjāti
analyzed: dajjāti ca dakkhiṇā dajjāti ca dve pāṭhāḥ dissanti tattha pacchimassa dajjāti

analyzed: dajjum dajjāsi dajjātha dajjāmi dajjāma dajjāvhaḥ dajjanti etāni api dadeyyum

original: dyakārasamaññogassa jjakāradvayañca katvā nipphajjanti. Etesu dajjāsīti yaṃ rūpaṃ
analyzed: dyakāra samaññogassa jjakāra dvayam ca katvā nipphajjanti etesu dajjāsi iti yam rūpam

original: Esa nayo aññatrāpi yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo.

original: Du gatiyaṃ. Davati. Dumo. Ettha ca davati gacchati mūlakkhandhasākhāviṭapapattapallavapupphaphalehi vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇātīti dumo.

original: Desodhane. Sodhanaṃ pariyodāpanaṃ. Dāyati. Dāyanaṃ. Yathā gāyati, gāyanaṃ. Dāyituṃ, dāyitvā, dhātāvayavassekārassa āyādeso. “Dātuṃ, datvā” iccapi rūpāni.

analyzed: tatra dātum iti sodhetum datvā ati sodhetvā ati atthaḥ gahetabbo tathā hi bālaḥ abyattaḥ

original: Khāda bhakkhane. Khādati. Khādikā, khādanaṃ, aññamaññakhādikā. Pubbaphalakhādikā, khajjaṃ, khādanīyaṃ, khandhā.

analyzed: ettha viya khajjanti saddo kammattho

original: Bada theriye. Thirabhāvo theriyaṃ, yathā dakkhiyaṃ. Badati. Badarī, badaraṃ. Atridaṃ vuccati –
analyzed: theriye thira bhāvaḥ theriyam yathā dakkhiyam badati badarī badaram atridam vuccati

original: Kakkandhu badarī kolī, kolaṃ kulavamiccapi;
Tenilaṃ badarañcāti, nāmaṃ rukkhassa koliyāti.
analyzed: tenilam badaram ca ati nāmam rukkhassa koliyā ti

original: Khada dhitihiṃsāsu ca. Theriyāpekkhāya cakāro. Khadati. Khadiro.

original: Gada viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ. Gadati. Āgadanaṃ, tatho āgado etassāti tathāgato. Suṭṭhu gadatīti sugado.

original: Rada vilekhane. Radati. Radano, rado, dāṭhārado. Atra radanoti danto.
analyzed: vilekhane radati radanaḥ radaḥ dāṭhāradaḥ atra

original: Nada abyattasadde. Sīho nadati, paṇadati. Nādo, nadī. Pabbatesu vanādīsu nadatīti nadī. Nada i iti dhātudvayavasena pana “nadantī gacchatīti nadī”tipi nibbacanaṃ vadanti.
analyzed: abyatta sadde sīhaḥ nadati paṇadati nādaḥ nadī pabbatesu vana ādīsu nadati iti nadī iti dhātu dvaya vasena pana nadantī gacchati iti nadī itipi nibbacanam vadanti

original: Kecettha vadeyyuṃ yā panesā “nada abyattasadde’ti dhātu tumhehi vuttā, sā kiṃniccamabyattasaddeyeva
analyzed: keca ittha vadeyyum yā pana isā nada abyatta saddā iti dhātu tumhehi vuttā sā kiṃniccam abyatta saddeyā iva

original: vattati, udāhu katthaci viyattiyampi vācāyaṃ vattatī”ti? Niccamabyattasaddeyeva vattatīti.
analyzed: vattati udāhu katthaci vācā ayam vattati iti niccam abyatta saddeyā iva vattati iti

original: Yajjevaṃ “sīho nadatī”tiādīsu tiracchānagatādisaddabhāvena avibhāvitatthatāya nadasaddo
analyzed: sīhaḥ nadati iti ādīsu tiracchāna gata ādi sadda bhāvena avibhāvita tthatāya nada saddaḥ

original: abyattasaddo hotu, “sīho viya ayaṃ puriso nadatī”tiādīsu pana manussabhāsāpi abyattasaddo

original: nadasaddena niddisiyati, na purisāpekkhanavasena. Yathā hi valāhakūpamāvasena kathitaṃ,

original: “kathañca puggalo gajjitā ca vassitā ca hotī”ti pāḷiyaṃ gajjanaṃ vassanañca puggale

original: alabbhamānampi valāhakassa gajjanavassanasadisatāya bhāsanakaraṇakriyāyūpalabbhanato

original: vattabbameva hoti, evameva nibbhayabhāvena sīhanādasadisiyā vācāya niccharaṇato sīho

Hūtapati mahindo ca, kosiyo devakuñjaro.

original: Ekaṅgadassī dummedho, satadassīva paṇḍito”ti.

original: Vidi avayave. Vindati. Yadi abhidhānamatthi, “vindo”ti dissati. Yathā kaṇḍati. Kaṇḍo.
analyzed: vidi avayave vindati yadi abhidhānam atthi vindo ti dissati yathā kaṇḍati kaṇḍo

original: Khidi avayaveti candaviduno vadanti. Tesaṃ mate “khindatī”ti rūpaṃ.
analyzed: avayava iti candavidunaḥ vadanti tesam mate khindati iti rūpam

original: Nidi kucchāyaṃ. Kucchāsaddo garahattho. Nindati. Nindā.

original: Porāṇametaṃ atula, netaṃ ajjatanāmiva;
analyzed: porāṇam etam atula netam ajjatanām iva

original: Nindanti tuṇhimāsīnaṃ, nindanti bahubhāṇinaṃ;
analyzed: nindanti tuṇhim āsīnam nindanti bahu bhāṇinam

original: Mitabhāṇimpi nindanti, natthi loke anindito.
analyzed: mita bhāṇim pi nindanti natthi loke anindito

original: Avaṇṇo aguṇo nindā, garahā ayasopi ca;

original: Asiloko akitti ca, asilāghā ca atthuti.
analyzed: asi lokaḥ akitti ca asi lāghā ca atthuti

original: Nanda samiddhiyaṃ. Akammikā dhātu. Nandati puttehi puttimā. Nandāya nuna maraṇena.
analyzed: nanda samiddhiyam akammikā dhātu nandati puttehi puttimā nandāya maraṇena

original: Nandasi sirivāhana. Nandanaṃ vanaṃ. Abhisaddayoge panāyaṃ sakammakopi. Abhinandanti
analyzed: nandasi sirivāhana nandanam vanam abhisadda yoge pana ayam abhinandanti

original: āgataṃ nābhinandanti maraṇaṃ.
analyzed: āgatam na abhinandanti maraṇam

original: Sirīva rūpiniṃ disvā, nanditaṃ āsi taṃ kulaṃ;
analyzed: sirī iva rūpinim disvā nanditam āsi tam kulam

original: Tena nandāti me nāmaṃ, sundaraṃ pavaraṃ ahu.
analyzed: tena me nāmam sundaram pavaram

original: Rammaṃ veḷuvanaṃ yena, na diṭṭhaṃ sugatālayaṃ;
analyzed: rammam veḷu vanam yena na diṭṭham sugata ālayam

original: Na tena nandanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, iti maññe mahesayaṃ.
analyzed: na tena nandanam diṭṭham iti maññe mahesayam

original: Yena veḷuvanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, naranandananandanaṃ;
analyzed: yena veḷuvanam diṭṭham nara nandana nandanam

original: Sudiṭṭhaṃ nandanaṃ tena, amarindasunandanaṃ.
analyzed: su diṭṭham nandanam tena amarinda sunandanam

original: Cadi hilādane dittiyañca. Hilādanaṃ sukhanaṃ. Ditti sobhā. Candati. Candano, cando.
analyzed: cadi hilādane dittiyam ca hilādanam sukhanam ditti sobhā candati candano cando

original: Ettha ca candanassapi anekāni nāmāni – candanaṃ, gandhasāro, malayajo, suvaṇṇacandanaṃ,
analyzed: ettha ca candanassa api anekāni nāmāni candanam gandhasāraḥ malayajaḥ suvaṇṇacandanam

original: haricandanaṃ, rattacandanaṃ, gosītacandanaṃ. Candayati hilādayati sītaguṇasamaṅgitāya
analyzed: haricandanam rattacandanam gosītacandanam candayati hilādayati sīta guṇa samaṅgi tāya

original: sattānaṃ paliḷāhaṃ vūpasamentaṃ sukhaṃ uppādetīti candanaṃ. Candoti somo, sopi candayati
analyzed: sattānam paliḷāham vūpasamentam sukham uppādeti iti candanam somaḥ saḥ api candayati

original: hilādayati sītaguṇasampattiyā attano pabhāya sattānaṃ pariḷāhaṃ vūpasamento sukhaṃ

original: uppādetīti candoti vuccati. Atha vā candati dibbati siriyā virocatīti cando. Āgamaṭṭhakathāsu
analyzed: uppādeti iti cando ti vuccati atha vā candati dibbati siriyā virocati iti cando āgama aṭṭhakathāsu

original: pana “chandaṃ janetīti cando”ti vuttaṃ. Tassāpi anekāni nāmāni –
analyzed: pana chandam janeti iti cando ti vuttam tassa api anekāni nāmāni

original: Cando nakkhattarājā ca, indu somo nisākaro;
analyzed: candaḥ nakkhatta rājā ca indu somaḥ nisākaro

original: Candimā mā nisānātho, osadhī so nisāpati.
analyzed: candimā mā nisānātha u osadhī saḥ nisāpati

original: Uḷurājā sasaṅko ca, himaraṃsi sasīpi ca;
analyzed: uḷurājā ca himaraṃsi sasīpi ca

original: Dvijarājā sasadharo, tārāpati himaṃsu ca.

original: Kumudabandhavo ceva, migaṅko ca kalānidhi;

original: Sudhaṃ sudhi dhūpi yūpa-rasmi ceva khamākaro;
analyzed: ca iva

original: Nakkhatteso ca rajanī-karo subbhaṃsu eva ca.

original: Tadi cetāyaṃ. Tandati. Tandī.
analyzed: tadi cetā ayam tandati tandī

original: Kalidi paridevane. Kalindati.
analyzed: kalidi paridevane kalindati

original: Khoda paṭighāte. Khodati.
analyzed: khoda paṭighāte khodati

original: Khudi āpavane. Khundati.
analyzed: khudi āpavane khundati

original: Sidi sītiye. Sītiyaṃ sītibhāvo. Sindati. Sosindo, sotatto.

original: Vanda abhivādanathutīsu. Vandati, abhivandati. Abhivandanā, vandanaṃ, vandako.

analyzed: idam dadāma te nātha saraṇam hohi nāyaka ati

original: Uda mode kīḷāyañca. Udati. Udānaṃ. Udaggo.

original: Rahada abyattasadde. Rahadati. Rahado.

analyzed: cupa mandagatiyam copati

original: Tupa hiṃsāyaṃ. Topati. Tuppati.
analyzed: tupa hiṃsa ayam topati tuppati

original: Gupa gopanajigucchanesu. Gopati, jigucchati. Jigucchaṃ, jigucchamāno. Jegucchī. Jigucchitvā iccādīni.
analyzed: gupa gopana jigucchanesu gopati jigucchati jiguccham jigucchamānaḥ jegucchī jigucchitvā icca ādīni

original: Kapu hiṃsātakkalagandhesu. Kappati. Kappūro.
analyzed: kapu hiṃsā takkala gandhesu kappati kappūraḥ

original: Kapu sāmatthiye. Idaṃ amhākaṃ kappati. Netaṃ amhesu kappati.
analyzed: kapu sāmatthiye idam amhākam kappati na itam amhesu kappati

original: Kapa karuṇāyaṃ. Kapati. Kapaṇo, kāpaññaṃ. Tattha kapatīti karuṇāyati, kāpaññanti kapaṇabhāvo.
analyzed: kapa karuṇāyam kapati kapaṇaḥ kāpaññam tattha kapati iti karuṇāyati kāpaññanti kapaṇa bhāvaḥ

original: Sapa akkose. Sapati. Sapatho, abhisapatho, abhisapito, sapanako.
analyzed: sapa akkose sapati sapathaḥ abhisapathaḥ abhisapitaḥ sapanakaḥ

original: Vapa bījanikkhepe. Bījaṃ vapati. Vāpako. Vāpitaṃ dhaññaṃ. Vuttaṃ bījaṃ purisena. Bījaṃ vappati. Vappamaṅgalaṃ.
analyzed: vapa bīja nikkhepe bījam vapati vāpakaḥ vāpitam dhaññam vuttam bījam purisena bījam vappati vappamaṅgalam

original: Supa sayane. Supati. Sukhaṃ supanti munayo, ye itthīsu na bajjhare. Sutto puriso, supanaṃ, suttaṃ.
analyzed: supa sayane supati sukham supanti munayaḥ ye itthīsu na bajjhare sutto puriso supanam suttam

original: Khipa peraṇe. Peraṇaṃ cuṇṇikaraṇaṃ pisanaṃ. Khepati. Khepako.
analyzed: khipa peraṇe peraṇam cuṇṇi karaṇam pisanam khepati khepakaḥ

original: Khipa abyattasadde. Khipati. Khipitasaddo. Yadā ca dhammaṃ desento, khipi lokagganāyako.
analyzed: abyatta sadde khipati khipita saddaḥ yadā ca dhammam desento lokagga nāyako

original: Khipa chaḍḍano. Khipati, ukkhipati, vikkhipati, avakhipati, saṃkhipati. Khittaṃ, ukkhittaṃ, pakkhittaṃ, vikkhittaṃ iccādīni.
analyzed: khipati ukkhipati vikkhipati avakhipati saṃkhipati khittam ukkhittam pakkhittam vikkhittam iccādīni

original: Opa niṭṭhubhane. Niṭṭhubhanaṃ kheḷapātanaṃ. Opati. Osadhaṃ saṅkharitvā mukhe kheḷaṃ opi.
analyzed: opa niṭṭhubhane niṭṭhubhanam kheḷa pātanam opati osadham saṅkharitvā mukhe kheḷam opi

original: Lipi upalepe. Lepati. Littaṃ paramena tejasā.
analyzed: lipi upalepe lepati littam paramena tejasā

original: Khipi gatiyaṃ. Khimpati.
analyzed: khipi khimpati

original: Ḍipa khepe. Ḍepati.
analyzed: ḍipa khepe ḍepati

original: Nidapi nidampane. Nidampanaṃ nāma sassarukkhādīsu vīhisīsaṃ vā varakasīsaṃ vā acchinditvā
analyzed: nidapi nidampane nidampanam nāma sassa rukkha ādīsu vīhi sīsam vā varaka sīsam vā a chinditvā

original: khuddakasākhaṃ vā abhañjitvā yathāṭhitameva hatthena gahetvā ākaḍḍhitvā bījamattasseva
analyzed: khuddaka sākham vā a bhañjitvā yathā ṭhitam eva hatthena gahetvā ākaḍḍhitvā bīja mattassa iva

original: vā paṇṇamattasseva vā gahaṇaṃ. Puriso vīhisīsaṃ nidampati, rukkhapattaṃ nidampati.
analyzed: vā paṇṇa mattassa iva vā gahaṇam purisaḥ vīhi sīsam nidampati rukkha pattam nidampati

original: Nidampako, nidampitaṃ, nidampituṃ, nidampitvā.
analyzed: nidampakaḥ nidampitam nidampitum nidampitvā

original: Tapa dittiyaṃ. Ditti virocanaṃ. Divā tapatiādicco.
analyzed: tapa dittiyam ditti virocanam divā tapati ādiccaḥ

original: Tapa ubbege. Ubbego utrāso bhīrutā. Tapati, uttapati. Ottappaṃ, ottappiyaṃ dhanaṃ.
analyzed: tapaḥ ubbege ubbegaḥ utrāsaḥ bhīru tā tapati uttapati ottappam ottappiyam dhanam

original: Tapa dhūpa santāpe. Tapati. Tapodhanaṃ, ātāpo. Ātāpī. Ātapaṃ. Dhūpati, sandhūpano, kamme tāpiyati. Dhūpiyati. Bhāve tāpanaṃ, tāpo, paritāpo, santāpo. Dhūpanaṃ.
analyzed: tapa dhūpa santāpe tapati tapodhanam ātāpaḥ ātāpī ātapam dhūpati sandhūpanaḥ kamme tāpiyati dhūpiyati bhāve tāpanam tāpaḥ paritāpaḥ santāpaḥ dhūpanam

original: Pakārantadhāturūpāni.
analyzed: pakāra anta dhātu rūpāni

original: Phakārantadhātu
analyzed: phakāra anta dhātu

original: Puppha vikasane. Akammako cāyaṃ sakammako ca. Pupphati. Pupphaṃ, pupphanaṃ, pupphito,
analyzed: puppha vikasane akammakaḥ ca ayam sa kammakaḥ ca pupphati puppham pupphanam pupphitaḥ

original: pupphituṃ, pupphitvā. Pupphanti pupphino dumā. Thalajā dakajā pupphā, sabbe pupphanti
analyzed: pupphitum pupphitvā pupphanti pupphinaḥ dumā thala jāḥ daka jāḥ pupphā sabbe pupphanti

original: tāvade. Mañjūsako nāma rukkho yattakāni udake vā thale vā pupphāni, sabbāni pupphati.
analyzed: tāvade mañjūsakaḥ nāma rukkhaḥ yattakāni udake vā thale vā pupphāni sabbāni pupphati

original: Tupha hiṃsāyaṃ. Tophati.
analyzed: tupha hiṃsā ayam tophati

original: Dapha daphi vappha gatiyaṃ. Daphati. Damphati. Vapphati.
analyzed: dapha daphi vappha gatiyam daphati damphati vapphati

original: Dipha kathanayuddhanindāhiṃsādānesu. Dephati. Depho.
analyzed: dipha kathana yuddha nindā hiṃsā dānesu dephati dephaḥ

original: Tapha tittiyaṃ. Titti tappanaṃ, taphati.
analyzed: tapha tittiyam titti tappanam taphati

original: Dupha upakkilese. Upakkilissanaṃ upakkileso. Dophati.
analyzed: duphaḥ upakkilese upakkilissanam upakkilesaḥ dophati

original: Gupha ganthe. Gantho ganthikaraṇaṃ. Gophati.
analyzed: gupha ganthe ganthaḥ ganthi karaṇam gophati

original: Phakārantadhāturūpāni.
analyzed: phakāra anta dhātu rūpāni

original: Bakārantadhātu
analyzed: bakār anta dhātu

original: Bhabba hiṃsāyaṃ. Bhabbati. Bhabbo.
analyzed: bhabba hiṃsā ayam bhabbati bhabbaḥ

original: Pabba vabba mabba kabba khabba gabba sabba cabba gatiyaṃ. Pabbati. Vabbati. Mabbati. Kabbati. Khabbati. Gabbati. Sabbati. Cabbati.
analyzed: pabba vabba mabba kabba khabba gabba sabba cabba gatiyam pabbati vabbati mabbati kabbati khabbati gabbati sabbati cabbati

original: Abba sabba hiṃsāyañca. Gatyāpekkhāya cakāro. Abbati. Sabbati.
analyzed: hiṃsā ayam ca gatya apekkhāya cakāraḥ

original: Kubi acchādane. Kubbati.
analyzed: kubi acchādane kubbati

original: Lubi tubi addane. Lumbati. Tumbati. Lumbinīvanaṃ. Udakatumbo. Athopi dve ca tumbāni.
analyzed: lupi tupi addane lumbati tumbati lumbinī vanam udaka tumbaḥ dve ca tumbāni

original: Cubi vadanasaṃyoge. Puttaṃ muddhani cumbati. Mukhe cumbati. Ettha siyā “yadi vadanasaṃyoge
analyzed: vadana saṃyoge puttam cumbati mukhe cumbati ettha siyā yadi vadana saṃyoge

original: cubidhātu vattati, kathaṃ ambudharabinducumbitakūṭoti ettha avadane aviññāṇake pabbatakūṭe
analyzed: cubi dhātu vattati katham ambudhara bindu cumbita kūṭaḥ ti ettha a vadane a viññāṇake pabbata kūṭe

original: ambudharabindūnaṃ cumbanaṃ vutta”nti? Saccaṃ, taṃ pana cumbanākārasadisenākārena
analyzed: ambudhara bindūnam cumbanam vuttan ti saccam tam pana cumbana ākāra sadisena ākārena

original: sambhavaṃ cetasi ṭhapetvā vuttaṃ, yathā adassanasambhavepi dassanasadisenākārena
analyzed: sambhavam cetasi ṭhapetvā vuttam yathā a dassana sambhave api dassana sadisena ākārena

original: sambhūtattā “rodante dārake disvā, ubbiddhā vipulā dumā”ti acakkhukānampi rukkhānaṃ
analyzed: sambhūta ttā rodante dārake disvā ubbiddhā vipulā dumāti acakkhukānam pi rukkhānaṃ

original: dassanaṃ vuttaṃ, evamidhāpi cumbanākārasadisenākārena sambhūtattā avadanānampi ambudharabindūnaṃ
analyzed: dassanam vuttam evam idha api cumbana ākāra sadisena ākārena sambhūta ttā a vadanānam pi ambudhara bindūnam

original: cumbanaṃ vuttaṃ. Sabhāvato pana aviññāṇakānaṃ dassanacumbanādīni ca natthi, saviññāṇakānaṃyeva
analyzed: cumbanam vuttam sabhāvataḥ pana aviññāṇakānam dassana cumbana ādīni ca natthi sa viññāṇakānam yeva

original: tāni hontīti. Ayaṃ nayo kamu padavikkhepetiādīsupi netabbo.
analyzed: tāni honti iti ayam nayaḥ netabbaḥ

original: Ubbi tubbi thubbi dubbi dhubbi hiṃsatthā. Ubbati. Tubbati. Thubbati. Dubbati. Dubbā.
analyzed: ubbi tubbi thubbi dubbi dhubbi hiṃsatthāḥ ubbati tubbati dubbati dubbā

original: Dhubbati. Ettha dubbāti dabbatiṇaṃ, yaṃ “tiriyā nāma tiṇajātī”ti pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ.
analyzed: ettha dubbāti dabba tiṇam yam tiriyā nāma tiṇa jāti iti pāḷiyam āgatam

original: Ettha ca dubbāti itthiliṅgaṃ, dabbanti napuṃsakaliṅganti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: ettha ca itthi liṅgam dabbanti napuṃsaka liṅgam ti daṭṭhabbam

original: Mubbi bandhane. Mubbati.
analyzed: mubbi bandhane mubbati

original: Kubbi uggame. Kubbati.
analyzed: kubbi uggame kubbati

original: Pubba pabba sabba pūraṇe. Pubbati. Pabbati. Sabbati. Etta siyā “nanu bho pubbasabbasaddā
analyzed: pubba pabba sabba pūraṇe pubbati pabbati sabbati etta siyā nanu bho pubba sabba saddā

original: sabbanāmāni, kasmā panete dhātucintāyaṃ gahitā”ti? Vuccate – sabbanāmesu ca tumantādivirahitesu
analyzed: sabbanāmāni kasmā pana ete dhātu cintā ayam gahitā iti vuccate sabbanāmesu ca tumanta ādi virahitesu

original: ca nipātesu upasaggesu ca dhātucintā nāma natthi, imāni pana sabbanāmāni na honti.
analyzed: ca nipātesu upasaggesu ca dhātu cintā nāma natthi imāni pana sabba nāmāni na honti

original: Kevalaṃ sutisāmaññena sabbanāmāni viya upaṭṭhahanti, tena te tabbhāvamuttattā dhātucintāyaṃ
analyzed: kevalam suti sāmaññena sabba nāmāni viya upaṭṭhahanti tena te dhātu cintā ayam

original: pubbācariyehi gahitā “pubbati sabbatī”ti payogadassanatoti. Yadi evaṃ kasmā buddhavacane
analyzed: pubba ācariyehi gahitā pubbati sabbati iti payoga dassanato ti yadi evam kasmā buddha vacane

original: etāni rūpāni na santīti? Anāgamanabhāvena na santi, na avijjamānabhāvena. Kiñcāpi
analyzed: etāni rūpāni na santi iti an āgamana bhāvena na santi na a vijjamāna bhāvena kiñca api

original: buddhavacanesu etāni rūpāni na santi, tathāpi porāṇehi anumatā purāṇabhāsāti gahetabbāni,
analyzed: buddha vacanesu etāni rūpāni na santi tathā api porāṇehi anumatā purāṇa bhāsā ati gahetabbāni

original: yathā “nāthatīti nātho”ti ettha “nāthatī”ti rūpaṃ buddhavacane avijjamānampi gahetabbaṃ
analyzed: yathā nāthati iti ettha nāthati iti rūpam buddha vacane a vijjamānam pi gahetabbam

original: hoti, evaṃ imānipi. Tasmā vohāresu viññūnaṃ kosallatthāya sāsane avijjamānāpi sāsanānurūpā
analyzed: hoti evam imāni api tasmai vohāresu viññūnam kosalla atthāya sāsane a vijjamānā api sāsana anurūpā

original: lokikappayogā gahetabbāti “pubbati sabbatī”ti rūpāni gahitāni. Esa nayo aññesupi ṭhānesu veditabbo.
analyzed: lokika ppayogā gahetabbā ati pubbati sabbati iti rūpāni gahitāni esa nayaḥ aññesu pi ṭhānesu veditabbo

original: Camba adane. Cambati.
analyzed: camba adane cambati

original: Kabba khabba gabba dabbe. Dabbo ahaṅkāro. Kabbati. Khabbati. Gabbati.
analyzed: kabba khabba gabba dabbe dabbaḥ ahaṅkāraḥ kabbati khabbati gabbati

original: Abi dabi sadde. Ambati. Ambā, ambu. Dambati.
analyzed: abi dabi sadde ambati ambā ambu dambati

original: Labi avasaṃsane. Avasaṃsanaṃ avalambanaṃ. Lambati, vilambati, byālambati. Nīce co’lambate
analyzed: avasaṃsane avasaṃsanam avalambanam lambati vilambati byālambati nīce ca ulambate

original: sūriyo. Ālambati. Ālambanaṃ, tadālambanaṃ, tadālambaṇaṃ, tadālambaṃ vā. Lābu. Alābu
analyzed: ālambati ālambanam tad ālambanam tad ālambaṇam tad ālambam vā lābu alābu

original: vā, akāro hi tabbhāve.
analyzed: vā akāraḥ hi tad bhāve

original: Bakārantadhāturūpāni.
analyzed: bakāra anta dhātu rūpāni

original: Bhakārantadhātu
analyzed: bhakāra anta dhātu

original: Bhā dittiyaṃ. Cando bhāti, pañhā maṃ paṭibhāti. Ratti vibhāti. Bhāṇu, paṭibhānaṃ. Vibhātā ratti.
analyzed: bhā dittiyam candaḥ bhāti pañhā mam paṭibhāti ratti vibhāti bhāṇu paṭibhānam vibhātā ratti

original: Bhī bhaye. Bhāyati. Bhayaṃ, bhayānako, bhīmo, bhīmaseno, bhīru, bhīruko, bhīrukajātiko. Kārite “bhāyeti, bhāyayati, bhāyāpeti, bhāyāpayatī”ti rūpāni.
analyzed: bhī bhaye bhāyati bhayam bhayānakaḥ bhīmaḥ bhīmasenaḥ bhīru bhīrukaḥ bhīruka jātikaḥ kārite bhāya iti bhāyayati bhāyāpa iti bhāyāpayati iti rūpāni

original: Sabhu sambhu hiṃsāyaṃ. Sabhati. Sambhati.
analyzed: sabhu sambhu hiṃsā ayam sabhati sambhati

original: Sumbha bhāsane ca. Cakāro hiṃsāpekkhako. Sumbhati. Sumbho. Kusumbho.
analyzed: sumbha bhāsane ca cakāraḥ hiṃsā apekkhakaḥ sumbhati sumbhaḥ kusumbhaḥ

original: Ettha sumbhoti āvāṭo. “Sumbhaṃ nikkhanāhī”ti idamettha nidassanaṃ. Kusumbhoti khuddakaāvāṭo, “pabbatakandarapadarasākhāparipūrā kusumbhe paripūrentī”ti idamettha nidassanaṃ.
analyzed: ettha sumbhaḥ iti āvāṭaḥ sumbham nikkhanāhi iti idam ettha nidassanam kusumbhaḥ ti khuddaka āvāṭaḥ pabbata kandara pada rasa ākhā paripūrā kusumbhe paripūrenti iti idam ettha nidassanam

original: Abbha vabbha mabbha gatiyaṃ. Abbhati. Abbho. Vabbhati. Mabbhati.
analyzed: abbha vabbha mabbha gatiyam abbhati abbhaḥ vabbhati mabbhati

original: Ettha abbhoti megho. So hi abbhati anekasatapaṭalo hutvā gacchatīti “abbho”ti vuccati.
analyzed: ettha abbho ti megho so hi abbhati aneka sata paṭalaḥ hutvā gacchati iti abbho ti vuccati

original: “Vijjumālī satakkakū”ti vuttaṃ. Satakkakūti ca anekasatapaṭalo. Ettha ca abbhasaddo
analyzed: vijjumālī sa takkakūti vuttam sa takkakūti ca aneka sata paṭalaḥ ettha ca abbha saddo

original: tiliṅgiko daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi ayaṃ “abbhuṭṭhitova sa yāti, sa gacchaṃ na nivattatī”ti
analyzed: tiliṅgikaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ tathā hi ayam abbhuṭṭhitaḥ iva sa yāti sa gaccham na nivattati iti

original: ettha pulliṅgo. “Abbhā, mahikā, dhūmo, rajo, rāhū”ti ettha itthiliṅgo. “Abbhāni candamaṇḍalaṃ
analyzed: ettha pulliṅgaḥ abbhā mahikā dhūmaḥ rajaḥ ettha itthi liṅgaḥ abbhāni canda maṇḍalam

original: chādentī”ti ettha napuṃsakaliṅgo.
analyzed: chādenti iti ettha napuṃsaka liṅgaḥ

original: Imāni pana meghassa nāmāni –
analyzed: imāni pana meghassa nāmāni

original: Megho valāhako laṅghi, jīmūto ambudo ghano;
analyzed: meghaḥ valāhakaḥ laṅghi jīmūtaḥ ambudaḥ ghanaḥ

original: Dhārādharo ambudharo, pajjunno himagabbhako.
Yabha methune. Mithunassa janadvayassa idaṃ kammaṃ methūnaṃ, tasmiṃ methune yabhadhātu vattati. Yabhati. Yābhassaṃ.
analyzed: methune mithunassa jana dvayassa idam kammam methūnam tasmin methune yabha dhātu vattati yabhati yābhassam

original: Ettha ca “methuna”nti esā sabbhivācā, lajjāsampannehi puggalehi vattabbabhāsābhāvato.
analyzed: ettha ca methunam ti esā sabbhivācā lajjā sampannehi puggalehi vattabba bhāsā abhāvato

original: Tathā hi “methuno dhammo na paṭisevitabbo”ti ca “na me rājā sakhā hoti, na rājā hoti
analyzed: tathā hi methunaḥ dhammaḥ na paṭisevitabbaḥ ti ca na me rājā sakhā hoti na rājā hoti

original: methuno”ti ca sobhane vācāvisaye ayaṃ bhāsā āgatā. “Yabhatī”tiādikā pana bhāsā “sikharaṇī”tiādikā
analyzed: ca sobhane vācā visaye ayam bhāsā āgatā pana bhāsā sikharaṇī iti ādikā

original: bhāsā viya asambhivācā. Na hi hirottappasampanno lokiyajanopi īdisiṃ vācaṃ bhāsati.
analyzed: bhāsā viya a sambhivācā na hi hira uttappa sampannaḥ lokiya janaḥ api īdisim vācam bhāsati

original: Evaṃ santepi adhimattukkaṃsagatahirottappopi bhagavā mahākaruṇāya sañcoditahadayo
analyzed: evam sante pi bhagavā mahā karuṇāya sañcodita hadayaḥ

original: lokānukampāya parisamajjhe abhāsi. Aho tathāgatassa mahākaruṇāti.
analyzed: loka anukampāya parisamajjhe abhāsi aho tathāgatassa mahā karuṇā ati

original: Imāni pana methunadhammassa nāmāni –
analyzed: imāni pana methuna dhammassa nāmāni

original: Saṃvesanaṃ niddhuvanaṃ, methunaṃ sūrataṃ rataṃ;
analyzed: saṃvesanam niddhuvanam methunam sūratam ratam

original: Byathayo gāmadhammo ca, yābhassaṃ mohanaṃ rati.
analyzed: ca yā abhassam mohanam rati

original: Asaddhammo ca vasala-dhammo mīḷhasukhampi ca;
analyzed: ca ca

original: Dvayaṃdvayasamāpatti, dvando gammo’dakantiko.
analyzed: dvayaṃdvaya samāpatti dvandaḥ

original: Sibha vibha katthane. Sibhati. Vibhati.
analyzed: sibha vibha katthane sibhati vibhati

original: Debha abhi dabhi sadde. Debhati. Ambhati. Ambho. Dambhati.
analyzed: debha abhi dabhi sadde debhati ambhati ambhaḥ dambhati

original: Ettha ca ambho vuccati udakaṃ. Tañhi nijjīvampi samānaṃ oghakālādīsu vissandamānaṃ ambhati saddaṃ karotīti ambhoti vuccati.
analyzed: ettha ca ambhaḥ vuccati udakam tat hi nijjīvam pi samānam ogha kāla ādīsu vissandamānam saddam karoti iti ambhaḥ iti vuccati

original: Imānissa nāmāni –
analyzed: imāni issa nāmāni

original: Pānīyaṃ udakaṃ toyaṃ, jalaṃ pāto ca ambu ca;
analyzed: pānīyam udakam toyam jalam ca ambu ca

original: Dakaṃ kaṃ salilaṃ vāri, āpo ambho papampi ca.
analyzed: dakam kam salilam vāri āpaḥ ambhaḥ papampi ca

original: Nīrañca kepukaṃ pāni, amataṃ elameva ca,
analyzed: nīram ca kepukam pāni amatam elam eva ca

original: Āponāmāni etāni, āgatāni tato tato.

original: Aya vaya paya maya taya caya raya gatiyaṃ. Ayati. Vayati. Payati. Mayati. Tayati.

original: Cayati. Rayati. Ayo, samayo, vayo, payo, rayo. Mayatayacayadhātūnaṃ nāmikapadāni upaparikkhitabbāni.

analyzed: santāna pālanesu tāyati tāyanam divādi gaṇe pana tā pālanā iti dhātum passatha

original: Cāyu pūjānisāmanesu. Pūjā pūjanā. Nisāmanaṃ olokanaṃ savanañca vuccati. “Iṅgha maddi
analyzed: pūjā nisāmanesu pūjā pūjanā nisāmanam olokanam savanam ca vuccati iṅgha maddi

original: Yakārantadhāturūpāni.

original: Rakārantadhātu

original: Rā ādāne. Rāti.

original: Ri santāne. Reti. Reṇu. Reṇūti rajo.

original: Brūtu, bruvitu, bruvantu. Brūhi, brūtha. Brūmi, brūma. Brūtaṃ, bruvantaṃ.

original: Ettha ca ambaṭṭhasutte “puna bhavaṃ gotamo bruvitū”ti pāḷidassanato “bruvitū”ti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sabbatthāpi upaparikkhitvā nayo gahetabbo.

original: Bruveyya, bruve, bruveyyuṃ. Bruveyyāsi, bruveyyātha. Bruveyyāmi, bruveyyāma. Bruvetha, bruveraṃ. Bruvetho, bruveyyāvho. Bruveyyaṃ. Bruveyyāmhe.

analyzed: pagā iva itaraḥ itarāsam nārī iti narena yogataḥ vā nārī aparam pa ittha nara saddassa

analyzed: byavahāraḥ api paṇṇatti pi vacanam api cetanā api tattha

analyzed: tīṇi pada rūpāni bhavanti

analyzed: haraḥ ādāne adinnam harati harissati it ca pa khara ajinam para sun ca

original: hāhitī”ti idamettha nidassanaṃ. Āharati, avaharati, saṃharati, apaharati, upaharati,

original: Dhara dharaṇe. Dharaṇaṃ vijjamānatā. Dharati. Dharate satthusāsanaṃ.
analyzed: dhara dharaṇe dharaṇam vijjamāna tā dharati dharate satthu sāsanam

analyzed: jāgara nidda kkhaye jāgarati jāgaraḥ jāgaraṇam jāgaram dīghā jāgarataḥ jāgaramānaḥ ayam ca dhātu tanādi gaṇam patvā jāgaroti paṭijāgaroti iti rūpāni janeti

original: Īra vacane gatikampanesu ca. Īrati. Īritaṃ. Eritaṃ. Samīraṇo. Jinerito dhammo. Kuppanti vātassapi eritassa.

analyzed: tattha samīraṇo ti vāto so hi samīrati vāyati samīreti ca rukkha sākhā paṇṇa ādīni suṭṭhu kampeti iti samīraṇo ti vuccati

original: Hare lajjāyaṃ. Aluttantoyamekāranto dhātu, gile pītikkhayeti dhātu viya. Harāyati. Harāyanaṃ. Aṭṭīyāmi harāyāmi.

analyzed: para pālana pūraṇesu parati paramotimassa rūpāni nara nayaneti dhātussa rūpāni viya

analyzed: tattha parati iti pāleti pūrati vā suddha kattu vasena idam padam vuttam hetu kattu vasena

analyzed: hi pāra iti pārayati iti ādīni rūpāni bhavanti paramaḥ ti pālakaḥ vā ettha ca

original: pālako cā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ vīmaṃsitabaṃ.

analyzed: tatra surati īsati devissariyam pāpuṇāti virocati vācā

original: ava āiccubho upasaggāti daṭṭhabbā.

original: Mātāpitācariyesu, dujjare alahumhi ca;

original: Mahante cuggate ceva, nichekādikaresu ca;
analyzed: mahante cuggate ca iva nicheka ādi karesu ca

original: Tathā vaṇṇavisesesu, garusaddo pavattati.
analyzed: tathā vaṇṇa visesesu garu saddo pavattati

original: Keci panācariyā “garu garū”ti ca dvidhā gahetvā bhāriyavācakatte garusaddo ṭhito.

original: Ācariyavācakatte pana gurusaddoti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Pāḷivisaye hi sabbesampi

analyzed: yathāvuttānam atthānam vācaka tte garu saddaḥ yā iva icchitabbaḥ akārassa ākāra bhāve

original: Mara pāṇacāge. Marati. Mattuṃ. Maritvā. Hetukattari “puriso purisaṃ māreti, mārayati.

analyzed: purisaḥ purisena purisam mārāpeti mārāpayati purisaḥ purisam māretum māretvā icca ādīni

original: rūpāni. Macco. Maru. Maraṇaṃ, maccu. Maṭṭu. Māro.
analyzed: rūpāni macco maru maraṇam maccu maṭṭu māro

original: Tattha mattunti marituṃ. Tathā hi alīnasattujātake “yo mattumicche pituno pamokkhā”ti
analyzed: tattha mattum ti maritum tathā hi alīna sattu jātake yaḥ mattum icche pitunā

original: Maraṇaṃ antako maccu, hindaṃ kālo ca maṭṭu ca;

original: Kila bandhe. Kilati. Kilaṃ.

original: Hiṃsa hiṃsāyaṃ. Hiṃsati. Hiṃsako, hiṃsanā, hiṃsā.

original: Jisu nisu visu misu vassa secane. Jesati. Nesati. Vesati. Mesati. Devo vassati.

analyzed: disā puratthima disā ādayaḥ tathā ime amhākam garuṭṭhānaṃ ti ādinā passitabbā ati disā

original: “Tamonudo buddho samantacakkhu,

original: Lokantagū sabbabhavātivatto;

analyzed: bhavitabbam hotum hetuye bhavitum hutvā hutvāna bhavitvā bhavitvāna

original: Ettha pana “atthi hehiti so maggo, na so sakkā na hetuye”ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: ettha pana atthi he hiti so maggaḥ na saḥ sakkā na hetuyā iti pāḷi nidassanam tattha

analyzed: gatiyam gacchati gamati ghammati āgacchati uggacchati atigacchati

analyzed: nigacchati niggacchati aññāni api yojetabbāni samuggacchati iti ādinā upasagga dvaya vasena api

analyzed: uggacchati iti uyyāti uddham gacchati atigacchati iti atikkamitvā gacchati paṭigacchati iti

original: pacchato gacchati. Upagacchatīti samīpaṃ gacchati. Apagacchatīti apeti. Vigacchatīti

original: vigamati. Nigacchatīti labhati. “Yasaṃ poso nigacchatī”ti idaṃ nidassanaṃ. Niggacchatīti
analyzed: vigamati nigacchati iti labhati yasam posaḥ nigacchati iti idam nidassanam niggacchati iti

original: nikkhamati. Sappatīti gacchati. Saṃsappatīti saṃsaranto gacchati. Parisappatīti samantato gacchati.
analyzed: nikkhamati sappati iti gacchati saṃsappati iti saṃsarantaḥ gacchati parisappati iti samantataḥ gacchati

original: padamālaṃ kathayāma. Seyyathidaṃ? So gacchati, te gacchanti, gacchare. Tvaṃ gacchasi,
analyzed: pada mālam kathayāma sā iyyathidam saḥ gacchati te gacchanti gacchare tvam gacchasi

original: tumhe gacchatha. Ahaṃ gacchāmi, mayaṃ gacchāma. So gacchate, te gacchante. Tvaṃ gacchase,
analyzed: tumhe gacchatha aham gacchāmi mayam gacchāma saḥ gacchate te gacchante tvam gacchase

original: tumhe gacchavhe. Ahaṃ gacche, mayaṃ gacchāmhe. Vattamānāya rūpāni.
analyzed: tumhe gacchavhe aham gacche mayam gacchāmhe vattamānāya rūpāni

original: So gacchatu, te gacchantu. Tvaṃ gacchāhi, gaccha, gacchassu, tumhe gacchatha. Ahaṃ
analyzed: saḥ gacchatu te gacchantu tvam gacchāhi gaccha gacchassu tumhe gacchatha aham

original: gacchāmi, mayaṃ gacchāma. So gacchataṃ, te gacchantaṃ. Tvaṃ gacchassu, tumhe gacchavho.
analyzed: gacchāmi mayam gacchāma saḥ gacchatam te gacchantam tvam gacchassu tumhe gacchavho

original: Ahaṃ gacche, mayaṃ gacchāmase. Pañcamiyā rūpāni.
analyzed: aham gacche mayam gacchāmase pañcamiyāḥ rūpāni

original: So gaccheyya, gacche, te gaccheyyuṃ. Tvaṃ gaccheyyāsi, tumhe gaccheyyātha. Ahaṃ gaccheyyāmi,
analyzed: saḥ gaccheyya gacche te gaccheyyum tvam gaccheyyāsi tumhe gaccheyyātha aham gaccheyyāmi

original: mayaṃ gaccheyyāma, gacchemu. So gacchetha, te gaccheraṃ. Tvaṃ gacchetho, tumhe gaccheyyāvho.
analyzed: mayam gaccheyyāma gacchemu saḥ gacchetha te gaccheram tvam gacchethaḥ tumhe gaccheyyāvho

original: Ahaṃ gaccheyyaṃ, mayaṃ gaccheyyāmhe. Sattamiyā rūpāni.
analyzed: aham gaccheyyam mayam gaccheyya amhe sattamiyā rūpāni

original: So gaccha, te gacchu. Tvaṃ gacche, tumhe gacchittha, gañchittha. Ahaṃ gacchaṃ, mayaṃ
analyzed: saḥ gaccha te gacchu tvam gacche tumhe gacchittha gañchittha aham gaccham mayam

original: gacchimha, gañchimha. So gacchittha, gañchittha, te gacchire. Tvaṃ gacchittho, tumhe
analyzed: gacchimha gañchimha saḥ gacchittha gañchittha te gacchire tvam gacchitthaḥ tumhe

original: gacchivho. Ahaṃ gacchiṃ, gañchiṃ, mayaṃ gacchimhe. Parokkhāya rūpāni.
analyzed: aham gacchim gañchim mayam gacchimhe parokkhāya rūpāni

original: So agacchā, te agacchū. Tvaṃ agacche, tumhe agacchatha. Ahaṃ agacchaṃ, mayaṃ agacchamhā.
analyzed: saḥ agaccha te tvam agacche tumhe agacchatha aham agaccham mayam agacchamhā

original: So agacchatha, te agacchatthuṃ. Tvaṃ agacchase, tumhe agacchivhaṃ. Ahaṃ agacchaṃ,
analyzed: saḥ agacchatha te agacchatthum tvam agacchase tumhe agacchivham aham agaccham

original: mayaṃ agacchimhe. Ajjataniyā rūpāni.
analyzed: mayam agacchimhe ajjataniyāḥ rūpāni

original: So gacchissati, te gacchissanti. Tvaṃ gacchissasi, tumhe gacchissatha. Ahaṃ gacchissāmi,
analyzed: saḥ gacchissati te gacchissanti tvam gacchissasi tumhe gacchissatha aham gacchissāmi

original: mayaṃ gacchissāma. So gacchissate, te gacchissante. Tvaṃ gacchissase, tumhe gacchissavhe.
analyzed: mayam gacchissāma saḥ gacchissate te gacchissante tvam gacchissase tumhe gacchissavhe

original: Ahaṃ gacchissaṃ, mayaṃ gacchissāmhe. Bhavissantiyā rūpāni.
analyzed: aham gacchissam mayam gacchissāmhe bhavissantiyāḥ rūpāni

original: So agacchissā, te agacchissaṃsu. Tvaṃ agacchisse, tumhe agacchissatha. Ahaṃ agacchissaṃ,
analyzed: saḥ agacchissā te agacchissan tvam agacchisse tumhe agacchissatha aham agacchissam

original: mayaṃ agacchissāmhā. So agacchissatha, te agacchissisu. Tvaṃ agacchissase, tumhe
analyzed: mayam agacchissāmhā saḥ agacchissatha te agacchissisu tvam agacchissase tumhe

original: agacchissavhe. Ahaṃ agacchissaṃ, mayaṃ agacchissāmhase. Kālātipattiyā rūpāni.
analyzed: agacchissavhe aham agacchissam mayam kāla atipattiyāḥ rūpāni

original: Tattha ajjataniyā kālātipattiyā ca akārāgamaṃ sabbesu purisesu sabbesu vacanesu labbhamānampi
analyzed: tattha ajjataniyā kāla atipattiyā ca akāra āgamam sabbesu purisesu sabbesu vacanesu labbhamānam pi

original: sāsane aniyataṃ hutvā labbhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi “agacchi, gacchi, agacchissā,
analyzed: sāsane aniyatam hutvā labbhati iti daṭṭhabbam tathā hi agacchi gacchi agacchissā

original: gacchissā”tiādinā dve dve rūpāni dissanti. Gamati, gamanti. Gamatu, gamantu. Gameyya.
analyzed: gacchissa ati ādinā dve dve rūpāni dissanti gamati gamanti gamatu gamantu gameyya

original: Gameyyuṃ. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
analyzed: gameyyum sesam sabbam vitthāretabbam

original: ghara”māga. Tumhe maggaṃ guttha, tumhe ghara’māguttha. Ahaṃ maggaṃ gaṃ, ahaṃ ghara’māgaṃ.

original: Udi pasavakiledanesu. Pasavanaṃ sandanaṃ. Kiledanaṃ tindatā. Undati. Undūro, samuddo.

original: Vida lābhe. Vindati. Govindo, vitti. Ettha vittīti anubhavanaṃ, vedanā vā.

original: Vida tuṭṭhiyaṃ. Vindati, nibbindati. Nibbindanaṃ. Virajjati. Nibbindo kāmaratiyā. Vitti, vittaṃ, vedo. Labhati atthavedaṃ dhammavedaṃ.

original: Ettha vittīti somanassaṃ. “Vitti hi maṃ vindati suta disvā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Vittanti
analyzed: ettha vitti iti somanassam vitti hi mam vindati suta disvā iti hi vuttam vittam ti

analyzed: tiṇṇam vedānam pāragūti ādīsu hi gantho vedo ti vuccati brāhmaṇam vedagum abhijaññā

analyzed: imam nānā dhātutaḥ samudīraye

original: Lipa limpane. Limpati, limpako. Avalepo. Avalepoti ahaṅkāro.
analyzed: lipa limpane limpati limpakaḥ avalepaḥ ahaṅkāraḥ

original: Lupa acchedane. Lumpati. Vilumpako, vilutto vilopo.

analyzed: katvā tathā tāḥ devatāḥ satta satāḥ uḷārāḥ brahmāḥ vimānāḥ abhinikkhamitvā atiādīsu brahmāno

original: “Abhikkantena vaṇṇena, yā tvaṃ tiṭṭhasi devate;
analyzed: abhikkantena vaṇṇena yā tvam tiṭṭhasi devate

original: Obhāsentī disā sabbā, osadhī viya tārakā”ti-
analyzed: obhāsentī disā sabbā osadhī viya tārakā ati

original: Ādīsu devadhītā.
analyzed: ādīsu deva dhītā

original: Imāni upapattidevānaṃ nāmāni –
analyzed: imāni upapattidevānam nāmāni

original: Devo suro ca vibudho, nijjaro amaro maru;
analyzed: devo suro ca vibudhaḥ nijjaraḥ amaraḥ maru

original: Sudhāsī tidaso sagga-vāsī animisopi ca;
analyzed: sudhāsī tidasaḥ saggavāsī animisaḥ api ca

original: Divoko’matapāyī ca, saggaṭṭho devatāni ca.
analyzed: divokomatapāyī ca saggaṭṭhaḥ devatāni ca

original: Khi khaye. Khiyati. Khayo. Khiyanaṃ. Rāgakkhayo.
analyzed: khi khaye khiyati khayaḥ khiyanam rāga khayaḥ

original: Khi nivāse kodhahiṃsāsu ca. Khiyati. Na gacchasi yamakkhayaṃ. Nāgadānena khiyanti.
analyzed: nivāse kodha hiṃsāsu ca khiyati na gacchasi yama khayam nāga dānena khiyanti

original: Tattha khiyatīti nivasati. Yamakkhayanti yamanivesanaṃ. Khiyantīti kujjhanti hiṃsanti vā.
analyzed: tattha khiyati iti nivasati yama khayanti yama nivesanam khiyanti iti kujjhanti hiṃsanti vā

original: Ghā gandhopādāne. Ghāyatīti ghānaṃ. Ghānena gandhaṃ ghāyituṃ ghāyitvā.
analyzed: ghā gandha upādāne ghāyati iti ghānam ghānena gandham ghāyitum ghāyitvā

original: Ruca rocane. Rocanaṃ ruci. Bhattaṃ me ruccati. Bhattampitassa na ruccati. Pabbajjā
analyzed: ruca rocane rocanam ruci bhattam me ruccati bhattampitassa na ruccati pabbajjā

original: mama ruccati. Ruccituṃ, ruccitvā. Keci pana imasmiṃ divādigaṇe “ruca dittimhī”ti
analyzed: mama ruccati ruccitum ruccitvā keci pana imasmin divādi gaṇe

original: paṭhanti. Taṃ na yuttaṃ katthacipi dittisaṅkhātasobhanatthavācakassa rucadhātuno
analyzed: paṭhanti tam na yuttam katthacipi ditti saṅkhāta sobhana ttha vācakassa ruca dhātunaḥ

original: “ruccatī”ti rūpābhāvato. Tasmā evaṃ sallakkhetabbaṃ, dittirucīnaṃ vācako rucadhātu
analyzed: ruccati iti rūpa abhāvataḥ tasmai evam sat lakkhetabbam ditti rucīnam vācakaḥ ruca dhātu

original: bhuvādigaṇiko. Tassa hi “rocati, virocati. Ekattamuparocita”nti rūpāniyeva bhavanti,
analyzed: tassa hi rocati virocati bhavanti

original: na “ruccatī”ti rūpaṃ. Ruciyāyeva vācako pana divādigaṇikopi hoti curādigaṇikopi.
analyzed: na ruccati iti rūpam curādi gaṇikā upi

original: Tassa hi divādigaṇikakāle “gamanaṃ mayhaṃ ruccatī”ti rūpaṃ. Curādigaṇikakāle “kiṃ
analyzed: tassa hi divādi gaṇika kāle gamanam mayham ruccati iti rūpam curādi gaṇika kāle kim

original: nu jātiṃ na rocesī”ti rūpaṃ. Āpubbo ce ācikkhane vattati, “āroceti, ārocayatī”ti rūpāni dissanti.
analyzed: nu jātim na rocesi iti rūpam āpubbo ce ācikkhane vattati āroceti ārocayati iti rūpāni dissanti

original: Muca mokkhe. Dukkhato muccati. Saddhāya adhimuccati. Mutti, vimutti, adhimutti, muccamāno.
analyzed: muca mokkhe dukkhataḥ muccati saddhāya adhimuccati mutti vimutti adhimutti muccamāno

original: Uca samavāye. Uccati. Oko, ūkā, ukkā.
analyzed: ucaḥ samavāye uccati okaḥ ūkā ukkā

original: Okoti udakampi āvāsopi. “Okapuṇṇehi cīvarehī”ti ca, “vārijova thale khitto, okamokatamubbhato”ti cettha payogo. Ūkāti sīse nibbattakimiviseso.
analyzed: udakam pi āvāsaḥ api oka puṇṇehi cīvarehi iti ca vāri jaḥ uva thale khitto ca ittha payogaḥ sīse

original: Ukkāti dīpikādayo vuccanti. “Ukkāsu dhāriyamānāsū”ti hi āgataṭṭhāne dīpikā “ukkā”ti
analyzed: ukkā iti dīpikā ādayaḥ vuccanti ukkāsu dhāriyamānāsu iti hi āgata ṭṭhāne dīpikā ukkā iti

original: vuccati. “Ukkaṃ bandheyya, ukkaṃ bandhitvā, ukkāmukhaṃ ālimpeyyā”ti āgataṭṭhāne aṅgārakapallaṃ.
analyzed: vuccati ukkam bandheyya ukkam bandhitvā ukkā mukham ālimpeyya ati āgata ṭṭhāne aṅgāraka pallam

original: “Kammārānaṃ yathā ukkā, anto jhāyati no bahī”ti āgataṭṭhāne kammāruddhanaṃ. “Evaṃ
analyzed: yathā ukkā antaḥ jhāyati no bahi iti āgata ṭṭhāne evam

original: vipāko ukkāpāto bhavissatī”ti āgataṭṭhāne vātavego “ukkā”ti vuccati. “Saṇḍāsena jātarūpaṃ
analyzed: vipākaḥ ukkāpātaḥ bhavissati iti āgata ṭṭhāne vāta vegaḥ ukkā ati vuccati saṇḍāsena jātarūpam

original: gahetvā ukkāmukhe pakkhipeyyā”ti āgataṭṭhāne suvaṇṇakārānaṃ mūsā “ukkā”ti veditabbā. Iccevaṃ –
analyzed: gahetvā ukkā mukhe pakkhipeyya ti āgata ṭṭhāne suvaṇṇakārānam mūsā ukkā ati veditabbā icc evam

original: Dīpikāvātavegesu, kammārānañca uddhane;
analyzed: dīpikā vāta vegesu uddhane

original: Mūsāyampi ca aṅgāra-kapalle cāti pañcasu;
analyzed: ca aṅgārakapalle ca ati pañcasu

original: Visayesu panetesu, ukkāsaddo pavattati;
analyzed: visayesu pana etesu ukkā saddo pavattati

original: Che chedane. Chiyati, chiyanti. Avacchitaṃ, avacchātaṃ. Chetvāna moḷiṃ varagandhavāsitaṃ.
analyzed: che chedane chiyati chiyanti avacchitam avacchātam chetvāna moḷim vara gandha vāsitam

original: Saja saṅge. Saṅgo laganaṃ. Sajjati. Sajjanaṃ, sajjito, satto.
analyzed: saja saṅge saṅgaḥ laganam sajjati sajjanam sajjitaḥ satto

original: Yuja samādhimhi. Samādhānaṃ samādhi, kāyakammādīnaṃ sammāpayogavasena avippakiṇṇatāti attho. Yujjati. Yogo, yogī.
analyzed: samādhimhi samādhānam samādhi kāya kamma ādīnam sammā apayoga vasena a vippakiṇṇa tā ti atthaḥ yujjati yogaḥ yogī

original: Ettha yogoti vīriyaṃ. Tañhi –
analyzed: ettha vīriyam tat hi

original: “Vāyametheva puriso, na nibbindeyya paṇḍito;
analyzed: vāyametha iva purisaḥ na nibbindeyya paṇḍitaḥ

original: Passāmi vo’ha’mattānaṃ, yathā icchiṃ tathā ahu”nti
analyzed: passāmi vohamattānam yathā icchim tathā ahunti

original: Vacanato avassaṃ kātuṃ yujjati upapajjatīti yogoti vuccati.
analyzed: vacanataḥ avassam kātum yujjati upapajjati iti yogo ti vuccati

original: Ranja rāge. Rajjati. Virajjati. Rajjamāno, rajjaṃ, rajjanto, rāgo, virāgo, rajjanaṃ,
analyzed: ranja rāge rajjati virajjati rajjamānaḥ rajjam rajjantaḥ rāgaḥ virāgaḥ rajjanam

original: virajjanaṃ, rajanīyaṃ. Upasaggavasena añño attho bhavati. Samhā raṭṭhā nirajjati,
analyzed: virajjanam rajanīyam upasagga vasena aññaḥ atthaḥ bhavati samhā raṭṭhā nirajjati

original: attano raṭṭhā niggacchatīti attho.
analyzed: attanaḥ raṭṭhā niggacchati iti attho

original: Tattha virāgoti virajjanti ettha saṃkilesadhammāti virāgo, nibbānaṃ maggo ca.
analyzed: tattha virāgaḥ oti virajjanti ettha saṃkilesa dhammā ati virāgo nibbānam maggo ca

original: Vijī bhayacalanesu. Vijjati, saṃvijjati. Saṃvego, saṃvejanīyaṃ. Ubbijjati. Ubbego, ubbiggahadayo.
analyzed: bhaya calanesu vijjati saṃvijjati saṃvegaḥ saṃvejanīyam ubbijjati ubbegaḥ ubbigga hadayaḥ

original: Luja vināse. Lujjatīti loko. Lopo, lutti, lujjanaṃ, lutto.
analyzed: vināse lujjati iti lokaḥ lopaḥ lujjanam

original: Ṭhā gatinivattiyaṃ. Ṭhāyati. Ṭhāyī, ṭhiti, ṭhānaṃ, ṭhito, tatraṭṭho, tiṭṭhaṃ, kappaṭṭhāyī, āsabhaṭṭhānaṭṭhāyī.
analyzed: gati nivattiyam ṭhāyati ṭhāyī ṭhiti ṭhānam ṭhitaḥ tatraṭṭhaḥ tiṭṭham kappa ṭṭhāyī āsabha ṭṭhāna ṭṭhāyī

original: “Sukhaṃ sayāmi ṭhāyāmi, sukhaṃ kappemi jīvitaṃ;
analyzed: sukham sayāmi ṭhāyāmi sukham kappemi jīvitaṃ

original: Ahatthapāso mārassa, aho satthānukampako”ti
analyzed: ahattha pāsaḥ mārassa aho sattha anukampako ti

original: Pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Lāpaṃ gocaraṭṭhāyinanti ca. Tattha ṭhāyāmīti tiṭṭhāmi.
analyzed: nidassanam lāpam gocara ṭṭhāyinan ti ca tattha ṭhāyāmi iti tiṭṭhāmi

original: Ḍigatiyaṃ. Ḍiyati. Ḍemāno. Ḍino vā. “Ucce sakuṇa ḍemāna, pattayāna vihaṅgama. Vajjesi kho tvaṃ vāmūru”nti nidassanaṃ.
analyzed: ḍigatiyam ḍiyati ḍemānaḥ ḍinaḥ vā ucce sakuṇa ḍemāna pattayāna vihaṅgama vajjesi kho tvam nidassanam

original: Ettha ḍiyatīti ḍemānoti nibbacanaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: ettha ḍiyati iti nibbacanam gahetabbam

original: Tā pālane. Tāyati. Aghassa tātā. So nūna kapaṇo tāto, ciraṃ rujjati assame. Tāṇaṃ, parittaṃ, gottaṃ. Tvaṃ khosi upāsaka katakalyāṇo katabhīruttāṇo.
analyzed: pālane tāyati aghassa tātā saḥ nūna kapaṇaḥ tātaḥ ciram rujjati assame tāṇam parittam gottam tvam kho asi upāsaka kata kalyāṇaḥ kata bhīru ttāṇaḥ

original: Tatra parittanti mahātejavantatāya samantato sattānaṃ bhayaṃ upaddavaṃ upasaggañca tāyati rakkhatīti parittaṃ, gaṃ tāyatīti gottaṃ.
analyzed: tatra parittam mahā tejavanta tāya samantataḥ sattānam bhayam upaddavam upasaggam ca tāyati rakkhati iti parittam gam tāyati iti gottam

original: Nata gattavināme. Gattavināmo gattavikkhepo. Naccati. Naccaṃ. Nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto.
analyzed: nata gatta vināme gatta vināmaḥ gatta vikkhepaḥ naccati naccam nigaṇṭhaḥ nāṭa putto

original: Dā sodhane. Dāyati. Dānaṃ. Anuyogadāpanatthaṃ. Anuyogaṃ datvā. Dānaṃ datvā.
analyzed: sodhane dāyati dānam anuyoga dāpanattham anuyogam da tvā dānam da tvā

original: Dā supane. Dāyati. Niddāyati. Niddāyanaṃ, niddāyamāno, niddāyanto.
analyzed: supane dāyati niddāyati niddāyanam niddāyamānaḥ

original: Dādāne. Puriso dānaṃ dāyati. Āpubbo gahaṇe. Adinnaṃ ādiyati. Sīlaṃ samādiyati. Kamme
analyzed: dādāne purisaḥ dānam dāyati āpubbaḥ gahaṇe adinnam ādiyati sīlam samādiyati kamme

original: – purisena dānaṃ dīyati, adinnaṃ ādiyati. Kārite – ādapeti, samādapeti, ādapayati,
analyzed: purisena dānam dīyati adinnam ādiyati kārite ādapeti samādapeti ādapayati

original: samādapayati, ye dhammamevādapayanti santo.
analyzed: samādapayati ye dhammam eva ādapayanti santo

original: Dā avakhaṇḍane. Diyati, diyanti. Parittaṃ.
analyzed: dāḥ avakhaṇḍane diyati diyanti parittam

original: Ettha ca parittanti samantato khaṇḍitattā parittaṃ. Appamattakañhi gomayapiṇḍaṃ parittanti vuccati. Tasmā parittanti appakassa nāmaṃ kāmāvacarassa ca dhammassa appesakkhattā.
analyzed: ettha ca parittam ti samantataḥ khaṇḍita ttā parittam appamattakam hi gomaya piṇḍam parittanti vuccati tasmā parittam ti appakassa nāmam kāmāvacarassa ca dhammassa

original: Dā suddhiyaṃ. Dāyati. Vodāyati. Vodānaṃ. Akammakoyaṃ dhātu. Tathā hi “vodāyati sujjhati etenāti vodānaṃ, samathavipassanā”ti nettisaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: suddhiyam dāyati vodāyati vodānam akammakoyam dhātu tathā hi vodāyati sujjhati etena ati vodānam samatha vipassanā iti netti saṃvaṇṇanāyam vuttam

original: Dī khaye. Dīyate. Dīno, ādīnavo.
analyzed: dī khaye dīyate dīnaḥ ādīnavaḥ

original: Tatra dīnoti parikkhīṇañātidhanādibhāvena dukkhito. Ādīnavotiādīnaṃ dukkhaṃ vāti adhigacchati etenātiādīnavo, doso.
analyzed: tatra dīnaḥ iti parikkhīṇa ñāti dhana ādi bhāvena dukkhitaḥ ādīnavaḥ ti ādīnam dukkham vāti adhigacchati etena ati ādīnavaḥ doso

original: Du paritāpe. Duyate. Duno, dūto.
analyzed: du paritāpe duyate dunaḥ dūtaḥ

original: Bhidi bhijjane. Bhijjanadhammaṃ bhijjati. Bhijjatīti bhinno. Bhijjanaṃ bhedo.
analyzed: bhidi bhijjane bhijjana dhammam bhijjati bhijjati iti bhinnaḥ bhijjanam bhedaḥ

original: Chidi chijjane. Suttaṃ chijjati. Chijjatīti chinno. Evaṃ chiddaṃ. Chijjanaṃ chedo.
analyzed: chidi chijjane suttam chijjati chijjati iti chinnaḥ evam chiddam chijjanam chedaḥ

original: Khidi dīniye. Dīnabhāvo dīniyaṃ, yathā dakkhiyaṃ. Khijjati, khinno, akhinnamati, khedo, khedaṅgato lokahitāya nātho.
analyzed: khidi dīniye dīna bhāvaḥ dīniyam yathā dakkhiyam khijjati khinnaḥ a khinna mati khedaḥ khedaṅgataḥ loka hitāya

original: Ettha khedaṅgatoti kāyikadukkhasaṅkhātaṃ parissamaṃ patto, dukkhamanubhavīti attho.
analyzed: ettha kheda aṅgataḥ ti kāyika dukkha saṅkhātam parissamam pattaḥ dukkham anubhavī iti attho

original: Pada gatiyaṃ. Pajjati. Maggaṃ paṭipajjati. Paṭipattiṃ paṭipajjati. Addhānamaggappaṭipanno
analyzed: gatiyam pajjati maggam paṭipajjati paṭipattim paṭipajjati addhāna magga ppaṭipannaḥ

original: hoti, phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati. Āpattiṃ āpajjati. Akammakampi bhavati, tesaṃ adhammo
analyzed: hoti phala samāpattim samāpajjati āpattim āpajjati a kamma kampi bhavati tesam adhammaḥ

original: āpajjati, pajjo, byagghapajjo, sampadāyo.
analyzed: āpajjati pajjaḥ byaggha pajjaḥ sampadāyaḥ

original: Ettha ca pajjoti maggo. Byagghapajje saddulapathe jātoti byagghapajjo, evaṃnāmako kulaputto. Sampadiyati ñāpiyati dhammo etenāti sampadāyo, akkhātā.
analyzed: ettha ca pajjoti maggaḥ byaggha pajje saddula pathe jāto ti byaggha pajjo evaṃnāmako kula putto sampadiyati ñāpiyati dhammo etena ati sampadāyaḥ akkhātā

original: Vida sattāyaṃ. Sattā vijjamānākāro. Vijjati, saṃvijjati. Jātavedo, vijjā, avijjā, vidito.
analyzed: vida sattā ayam sattā vijjamāna ākāraḥ vijjati saṃvijjati jātavedaḥ vijjā avijjā viditaḥ

original: Tattha jātavedoti aggi. So hi jātova vedayati dhūmajāluṭṭhānena paññāyati, tasmā
analyzed: tattha jātavedaḥ ti aggi so hi jātaḥ iva vedayati dhūma jālu ṭṭhānena paññāyati tasmā

original: jātavedoti vuccati. Vijjāti dhammānaṃ sabhāvaṃ viditaṃ karotīti vijjā, ñāṇaṃ. Avijjāti
analyzed: jātavedo ti vuccati vijjā ati dhammānam sabhāvam viditam karoti iti vijjā ñāṇam avijjā ati

original: khandhānaṃ rāsaṭṭhaṃ, āyatanānaṃ āyatanaṭṭhaṃ, dhātūnaṃ suññaṭṭhaṃ, saccānaṃ tathaṭṭhaṃ,
analyzed: khandhānam rāsaṭṭham āyatanānam āyatanaṭṭham dhātūnam suñña ṭṭham saccānam tathaṭṭham

original: indriyānaṃ adhipatiyaṭṭhaṃ aviditaṃ karotīti avijjā. Dukkhādīnaṃ pīḷanādivasena vuttaṃ
analyzed: indriyānam adhipatiya ṭṭham aviditam karoti iti avijjā dukkha ādīnam pīḷana ādi vasena vuttam

original: catubbidhaṃ atthaṃ aviditaṃ karotīti avijjā, moho.
analyzed: catubbidham attham aviditam karoti iti avijjā mohaḥ

original: Mada ummāde. Ummādo nāma muyha naṃ vā sativippavāso vā cittavikkhepo vā. Majjati,
analyzed: made ummāde ummādaḥ nāma vā sati vippavāsaḥ vā citta vikkhepo vā majjati

original: pamajjati. Matto, surāmadamatto. Matto ahaṃ mahārāja. Puttamaṃsāni khādayiṃ. Mattahatthī, pamatto, ummatto.
analyzed: pamajjati mattaḥ surā mada mattaḥ mattaḥ aham mahā rāja putta maṃsāni khādayim matta hatthī pamattaḥ ummattaḥ

original: Appamādo amataṃ padaṃ, pamādo maccuno padaṃ;
analyzed: appamādaḥ amatam padam pamādaḥ maccuno padam

original: Appamattā na miyyanti, ye pamattā yathā matā.
analyzed: appamattāḥ na miyyanti ye pamattāḥ yathā matā

original: Mida sinehane. Mejjati. Mettā, metti, mittaṃ, mitto.
analyzed: sinehane mejjati mettā metti mittam mittaḥ

original: Antaradhā adassane. Antarapubbo dhādhātu vijjamānassa vatthuno adassane vattati. Antaradhāyati. Antaradhānaṃ, antaradhāyanto. Sā devatā antarahitā. Antarāpidhāyati.
analyzed: antaradhā a dassane antarapubbaḥ dhā dhātu vijjamānassa vatthunaḥ a dassane vattati antaradhāyati antaradhānam antaradhāyantaḥ sā devatā antarahitā antarā apidhāyati

original: Budha avagamane. Avagamanaṃ jānanaṃ. Bujjhati, buddho, buddhi, buddhaṃ, bodho, bodhi. Bujjhitā saccāni. Sakalaṃ buddho, buddhavā, vibodheti, bodhetā, buddho, vibuddho iccādīni.
analyzed: avagamane avagamanam jānanam bujjhati buddhaḥ buddhi buddham bodhaḥ bodhi bujjhitā saccāni sakalam buddhaḥ buddhavā vibodheti bodhetā buddhaḥ vibuddhaḥ iccādīni

original: Tatra buddhoti bujjhitā saccānīti buddho, bodhetā pajāyāti buddho. Atha vā pāramitāparibhāvitāya
analyzed: tatra buddhaḥ iti saccāni iti buddhaḥ bodhetā pajāyāti buddhaḥ atha vā pāramitā paribhāvitāya

original: paññāya sabbampi ñeyyaṃ abujjhīti buddho. Keci pana kammenapi buddhasaddassa siddhaṃ
analyzed: paññāya sabbam pi ñeyyam abujjhi iti buddhaḥ keci pana kammena api buddha saddassa siddham

original: icchantā evaṃ nibbacanaṃ karonti “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavāti adhigataguṇavisesehi
analyzed: icchantāḥ evam nibbacanam karonti sammāsambuddhaḥ vata saḥ bhagavā iti adhigata guṇa visesehi

original: khīṇāsavehi bujjhitabboti buddho”ti. Vitthāro pana niddese vuttanayena gahetabbo.
analyzed: khīṇāsavehi bujjhitabbaḥ ti buddhaḥ ti vitthāraḥ pana niddese vutta nayena gahetabbaḥ

original: Dhanu yācane. Mātā hi tava irandhati, vidharassa hadayaṃ dhaniyyati. Idampi asādhāraṇaṃ divādirūpaṃ.

original: Dhī anādare. Dhīyate. Dhīno.

original: Yudha sampahāre. Yujjhati. Yodho, yuddhaṃ, caraṇāyudho, yakārassa vakārabhāve “āvudha”nti rūpaṃ. Tatra caraṇāyudhoti kukkuṭo.

original: Vidha vijjhane. Vijjhati. Paṭivijjhati. Khaṇa viddha, vidhu, vijjhanako, viddho, paṭividdho, vijjhanaṃ, vedho, paṭivedho, vijjhitvā, viddhā, viddhāna. Ko maṃ viddhā nilīyati.

original: etena kattuatthe rūpapadasiddhiṃ dasseti, ghaṭṭiyati pīḷiyatīti etehi kammatthe.

analyzed: sāsanā lokatas cete

original: Vadha saṃyame. Vadheti, vadhayati.

analyzed: vaddha bhāsa ayam vaddha iti vaddhayati

original: amadhātussa andhādesakaraṇavasena rūpanipphatti dassitā.

original: Badha bandhane. Migaṃ bādheti, bādhayati. Baddho migo, baddhosi mārapāsena.

original: Dhakārantadhāturūpāni.

original: Nakārantadhātu
analyzed: nakāra anta dhātu

original: Māna pūjāyaṃ pemane vīmaṃsāyaṃ. Māneti, mānayati. Mātā. Vimāneti, vimānayati, paṭimāneti, paṭimānayati. Mānanā, sammānanā, vimānanā, vimānaṃ, vimānanaṃ, mānito.

original: Amānanā yattha santo, santānaṃ vā vimānanā;

original: Vīmaṃsati, vīmaṃsā, vīmaṃsiyatīti vīmaṃsiyamāno. Vīmaṃsanto.

analyzed: vuttaḥ iti gahetabbaḥ mānana pūjana saddāḥ hi pariyāya saddattā vevacana saddāḥ eva vimāneti iti

original: Mana thambhe. Thambho cittassa thaddhatā. Māneti, mānayati. Māno.

original: Thana devasadde. Devasaddo meghasaddo, thaneti, thanayati.

original: Thena coriye. Corassa bhāvo coriyaṃ. Yathā sūriyaṃ, yathā ca dakkhiyaṃ. Theneti, thenayati. Theno, thenetvā.

original: Tavaggantadhāturūpāni.
analyzed: tavak ganta dhātu rūpāni

original: Pakārantadhātu
analyzed: pakāra anta dhātu

original: Kappa vidhimhi. Vidhi kriyā. Sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti. Kappayati. Moro vāsamakappayi. Sīhaseyyaṃ pakappentaṃ, buddhaṃ vandāmi gotamaṃ.

original: Tapa khaye. Tapeti, tapayati.

original: Upa pajjane. Upeti, upayati.
analyzed: upa pajjane upeti upayati

original: Capa kakkane. Capeti, capayati.

original: Suppa māne. Suppeti, suppayati.

original: Kipa dubballe. Kipeti, kipayati.

original: lāsentī. Atrāyaṃ pāḷi “vādentiyāpi lāsenti, naccantiyāpi lāsenti, lāsentiyāpi naccantī”ti.
analyzed: atra ayam pāḷi vādentiyā api lāsenti naccantiyā api lāsenti lāsentiyā api naccanti iti

original: Tattha lāsentīti yā uplavamānā viya uṭṭhahitvā lāsiyanāṭakaṃ nāṭenti, recakaṃ denti.
analyzed: tattha lāsenti iti yāḥ uplavamānāḥ viya uṭṭhahitvā lāsiya nāṭakam nāṭenti recakam denti

original: Bhūsa alaṅkāre. Bhūseti, bhūsayati. Vibhūseti, vibhūsayati. Bhūsanaṃ, vibhūsanaṃ.

original: Vasa sinehanachedāvaharaṇesu. Avaharaṇaṃ corikāya gahaṇaṃ. Vāseti, vāsayati. Vasā.

original: Tāsa vāraṇe. Vāraṇaṃ nivāraṇaṃ. Tāseti, tāsayati.
analyzed: tāsa vāraṇe vāraṇam nivāraṇam tāsa iti tāsayati

original: Dhasa uñche. Dhāseti, dhāsayati.
analyzed: dhasaḥ uñche dhāsā iti dhāsayati

original: Bhasa gahaṇe. Bhāseti, bhāsayati.
analyzed: bhasa gahaṇe bhāsā iti bhāsayati

original: Pusa dhāraṇe. Poseti, posayati, ābharaṇaṃ dhāretīti attho.
analyzed: dhāraṇe poseti posayati ābharaṇam dhāreti iti attho

original: Tusi pisi kusi dasi bhāsāyaṃ. Tuṃseti, tuṃsayati. Piṃseti, piṃsayati. Kuṃseti, kuṃsayati. Daṃseti, daṃsayati.
analyzed: tusi pisi kusi dasi bhāsāyam tuṃsa iti tuṃsayati piṃsa iti piṃsayati kuṃsa iti kuṃsayati daṃsa iti daṃsayati

original: Khusi akkosane. Khuṃseti, khuṃsayati. Khuṃsanā.
analyzed: khusi akkosane khuṃseti khuṃsayati khuṃsanā

original: Gavesa maggane. Gaveseti, gavesayati. Gavesako, gavesito, gavesanā, gaveṭṭhi.
analyzed: maggane gaveseti gavesayati gavesakaḥ gavesitaḥ gavesanā gaveṭṭhi

original: Vāsa upasevāyaṃ. Vāseti, vāsayati. Vāso, āvāso.
analyzed: vāsaḥ upasevā ayam vāsā iti vāsayati vāsaḥ āvāsaḥ

original: Hisi hiṃsāyaṃ. Hiṃseti, hiṃsayati.
analyzed: hisi hiṃsā ayam hiṃsā iti hiṃsayati

original: Nivāsa acchādane. Vatthaṃ nivāseti, nivāsayati. Pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā.
analyzed: nivāsa acchādane vattham nivāseti nivāsayati pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā

original: Aṃsa saṅghāte. Aṃseti, aṃsayati. Aṃso, aṃsā.
analyzed: aṃsa saṅghāte aṃseti aṃsayati aṃsaḥ aṃsā

original: Ettha ca aṃsoti koṭṭhāsopi khandhopi vuccati. Aṃsāti arisarogo.

original: Misa sajjane. Meseti, mesayati.
analyzed: misa sajjane meseti mesayati

original: Rasa assādane. Raseti, rasayati. Raso. Rasiyate assādiyate janehīti raso.
analyzed: rasa assādane rasayati rasaḥ rasiyate assādiyate janehi iti

original: Rasa sinehane. Raseti, rasayati. Raso.
analyzed: rasa sinehane rasayati

original: Siya asabbappayoge. Seseti, sesayati. Seso. Vipubbo atisaye, vipubbo atisaye, vipubbo sisadhātu atisaye vattati, viseseti, visesayati. Viseso, visiṭṭho, visesanaṃ.
analyzed: siya a sabba ppayoge seseti sesayati sesaḥ vipubbaḥ atisaye vipubbaḥ atisaye vipubbaḥ sisa dhātu atisaye vattati viseseti visesayati visesaḥ visiṭṭhaḥ visesanam

original: Missa sammisse. Misseti, missayati. Sammisseti, sammissayati. Misso, misso, missito,
analyzed: missa sammisse misseti missayati sammisseti sammissayati missaḥ missaḥ missitaḥ

original: sammissito, sammisso iccādīni. Alambusājātake missāti itthīnaṃ vattabbanāmaṃ, purisehi

original: saddhiṃ sammissanatāya.
analyzed: saddhim sammissana tāya

original: Jusa paritakkane. Joseti, josayati.
analyzed: paritakkane joseti josayati

original: Masa pahāsane. Maseti, masayati.
analyzed: masa pahāsane masa iti masayati

original: Marisa titikkhāyaṃ. Mariseti. Marisayati.
analyzed: marisa titikkha ayam marisa iti marisayati

analyzed: pisa pesane peseti pesayati pesakaḥ pesitaḥ

original: Vasa acchādane. Vāseti, vāsayati. Nivāseti, nivāsayati. Vatthaṃ.

original: Sineha sinehane. Sineheti, sinehayati.
analyzed: sineha sinehane sineha iti sinehayati

original: Varaha hiṃsāyaṃ. Varaheti, varahayati. Varāho.

original: Raha cāge. Raheti, rahayati.

analyzed: ḷakāra anta dhātu

analyzed: khaḷa bhede khaḷa iti khaḷayati

original: Divādigaṇe tā pālane. Lokaṃ tāyati santāyati. Imāni sakammakāni suddhakattupadāni. Hetukattupadaṃ pana kammapadañca bhāvapadañca appasiddhāni.
analyzed: divādi gaṇe tā pālane lokam tāyati santāyati imāni sa kammakāni suddha kattu padāni hetu kattu padam pana kamma padam ca bhāva padam ca appasiddhāni

original: Sudha saṃsuddhiyaṃ. Cittaṃ sujjhati visujjhati. Imāni akammakāni suddhakattupadāni.

analyzed: sārataḥ paccetabbam ayam nayo sukhumaḥ sāsane ādaram katvā āyasmantehi sādhukam manasi

original: kātabbo. Yassa hi atthāya idaṃ pakaraṇaṃ karimha, na ayaṃ attano mati, atha kho pubbācariyānaṃ
analyzed: kātabbaḥ yassa hi atthāya idam pakaraṇam karimha na ayam attanaḥ atha kho pubba ācariyānam

original: santikā laddhattā tesaññeva matīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: santikā laddha ttā tesaññā eva matī iti daṭṭhabbam

original: Idāni akāritadvikammikapadānaṃ vacanokāso anuppatto, tasmā tāni kathayāma, tāni ca kho dhātuvasena evaṃ veditabbāni savinicchayāni. Seyyathidaṃ?
analyzed: idāni a kārita dvikammika padānam vacana ukāsaḥ an uppatto tasmā tāni kathayāma tāni ca kho dhātu vasena evam veditabbāni sa vinicchayāni sā iyyathidam

original: Duhikaravahipucchi, yāci bhikkhi ca nibrūti;
analyzed: duhikara vahi pucchi yāci bhikkhi ca

original: Bhaṇivadivacibhāsi, sāsidahināthadhātu.
analyzed: bhaṇi vadi vaci bhāsi sa asi dahi nātha dhātu

original: Rudhi ji cipabhutīti, ye te dvikammakā dhīrā;
analyzed: ye te dvi kammakāḥ dhīrāḥ

original: Pavadumapi viyuttā, kāritappaccayehi ca.
analyzed: viyuttā ca

original: Apādānādike pubba-vidhimhā sahime’bravuṃ;
analyzed: apādāna ādike pubba vidhimhā sahi me bravum

original: Upayogavacanassa, nimittanti sanantanā.
analyzed: upayoga vacanassa nimittam ti sanantanā

original: Ete duhādayo dhātū, tikammāpi bhavanti tu;
analyzed: ete duha ādayaḥ bhavanti tu

original: Kāritappaccaye laddhe, iti ācariyā’bravuṃ.
analyzed: kārita paccaye laddhe iti ācariyā abravum

original: Tatrimāni udāharaṇāni – gavaṃ payo duhati gopālako. Gāviṃ khīraṃ duhati gopāladārako.
