original: Tattha payoti upayogavacanaṃ, “yaso laddhā na majjeyyā”ti ettha “yaso”ti padamiva.
analyzed: tattha payaḥ ti upayoga vacanam yasaḥ laddhā na majjeyyāti ettha padam iva

original: Manogaṇikassa hi īdisampi upayogavacanaṃ hoti aññādisampi. Issaro gopālaṃ gavaṃ payo
analyzed: manogaṇikassa hi īdisam pi upayoga vacanam hoti añña ādisam pi issaraḥ gopālam gavam payaḥ

original: duhāpeti. Gopālena gāvo khīraṃ duhitā. Gohi payo duhatīti ettha apādānavisayattā
analyzed: duha apeti gopālena gāvaḥ khīram duhitā payaḥ duhati iti ettha apādāna visaya ttā

original: dvikammakabhāvo natthi. “Visāṇato gavaṃ duhaṃ, yattha khīraṃ na vindatī”ti ettha
analyzed: dvikammaka bhāvaḥ natthi visāṇataḥ gavam duham yattha khīram na vindati iti ettha

original: pana apādānavisayattepi gavāvayavabhūtassa visāṇassa visuṃ gahitattā “gavaṃ khīraṃ
analyzed: pana apādāna visaya tte pi gavā avayava bhūtassa visāṇassa visum gahita ttā gavam khīram

original: duhanto”ti dvikammikabhāvo labbhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Duhino payogoyaṃ.
analyzed: duhanto ti dvikammika bhāvaḥ labbhati iti daṭṭhabbam duhino

original: Karotissa payoge kaṭṭhamaṅgāraṃ karoti, suvaṇṇaṃ kaṭakaṃ karoti, sace je saccaṃ bhaṇasi,
analyzed: karotissa payoge kaṭṭham aṅgāram karoti suvaṇṇam kaṭakam karoti sace je saccam bhaṇasi

original: adāsiṃ taṃ karomi. Ettha ca aṅgāraṃ karotīti pariccattakāraṇavasena vuttaṃ. Kaṭṭhañhi
analyzed: adāsim tam karomi ettha ca aṅgāram karoti iti pariccatta kāraṇa vasena vuttam kaṭṭhan hi

original: aṅgārabhāvassa kāraṇaṃ, aṅgāre kate kāraṇabhūtassa kaṭṭhassa kaṭṭhabhāvo vigacchati.
analyzed: aṅgāra bhāvassa kāraṇam aṅgāre kate kāraṇa bhūtassa kaṭṭhassa kaṭṭha bhāvaḥ vigacchati

original: Kaṭakaṃ karotīti idaṃ apariccattakāraṇavasena vuttaṃ. Suvaṇṇañhi kaṭakabhāvassa kāraṇaṃ,
analyzed: kaṭakam karoti iti idam apariccatta kāraṇa vasena vuttam suvaṇṇam hi kaṭaka bhāvassa kāraṇam

original: kaṭake katepi kārakabhūtassa suvaṇṇassa suvaṇṇabhāvo na vigacchati, atha kho visesantaruppattibhāvena
analyzed: kaṭake kate api kāraka bhūtassa suvaṇṇassa suvaṇṇa bhāvaḥ na vigacchati atha kho visesa antara uppatti bhāvena

original: sampajjati. Adāsiṃ taṃ karomīti idaṃ pana ṭhānantaradānavasena vuttaṃ “uparājaṃ mahārājaṃ
analyzed: sampajjati a dāsim tam karomi iti idam pana ṭhāna antara dāna vasena vuttam uparājam mahā rājam

original: karomī”ti ettha viya. Tattha “issaro purisena purisaṃ vā kaṭṭhamaṅgāraṃ kāreti. Tathā
analyzed: karomi iti ettha viya tattha issaraḥ purisena purisam vā kaṭṭham aṅgāram kāreti tathā

original: suvaṇṇaṃ kaṭakaṃ kāretī”ti tikammikappayogopi daṭṭhabbo. Tathā “brahmadatto rajjaṃ
analyzed: suvaṇṇam kaṭakam kāreti iti daṭṭhabbo tathā brahmadattaḥ rajjam

original: kāretī”ti, “brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente”ti dvikammakappayogo.
analyzed: kāreti iti brahmadatte rajjam dvi kamma kappa yogaḥ

original: Ettheke vadeyyuṃ “nanu ca bho ettha ekameva kammaṃ dissati, kenāyaṃ payogo dvikammikappayogo
analyzed: ettha ike vadeyyum nanu ca bho ettha ekam eva kammam dissati kena ayam payogaḥ dvi kammika ppayogo

original: hotī”ti. Kiñcāpi ekameva dissati, tathāpi atthato dveyeva kammāni dissantīti gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: hoti iti kiñcā api ekam eva dissati tathā api atthataḥ dveyeva kammāni dissanti iti gahetabbam

original: Tathā hi brahmadatto rajjaṃ kāretīti ettha brahmadatto attano rājabhāvaṃ mahājanena
analyzed: tathā hi brahmadattaḥ rajjam kāreti iti ettha brahmadattaḥ rāja bhāvam mahājanena

original: kārayatīti attho. Evaṃ pana atthe gahite “rajjaṃ kārehi bhaddante, kiṃ araññe karissasī”tiādīsupi
analyzed: kārayati iti atthaḥ evam pana atthe gahite rajjam kārehi bhaddante kim araññe karissasi itiādīsu pi

original: tvaṃ attano rājabhāvaṃ amhehi kārāpehi, attānaṃ rajje abhisiñcāpehi, mayaṃ taṃ rajje
analyzed: tvam attanaḥ rāja bhāvam amhehi kārāpehi attānam rajje abhisiñca apehi mayam tam rajje

analyzed: abhisiñcitu kāmā ati atthaḥ samatthitaḥ bhavati

original: Brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārenteti etthāpi brahmadatte attano rājabhāvaṃ mahājanena kārayanteti
analyzed: brahmadatte rajjam kārentā iti etthā api brahmadatte rāja bhāvam mahājanena kārayantā iti

original: attho bhavati. Sāsanasmiñhi kāritavisaye karaṇavacanaṃ upayogatthaññeva dīpeti, tasmā
analyzed: atthaḥ bhavati sāsanasmin hi kārita visaye karaṇa vacanam upayoga ttham na eva dīpeti tasmā

analyzed: atthataḥ dveyā iva kammani dissanti iti vadāma ayam atthaḥ abhidhammaṭīkā ayam cakkhu indriya ādi nibbacana attha vibhāvanāya

original: dīpetabbo. Tathā hi abhidhammaṭīkāyaṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ “cakkhudvāre indattaṃ kāretīti
analyzed: dīpetabbaḥ tathā hi abhidhamma ṭīkāyam idam vuttam cakkhu dvāre indattam kāreti iti

original: cakkhudvārabhāve taṃdvārikehi attano indabhāvaṃ paramissarabhāvaṃ kārayatīti attho.
analyzed: cakkhu dvāra bhāve taṃdvārikehi attanaḥ inda bhāvam paramissara bhāvam kārayati iti attho

original: Tañhi te rūpaggahaṇe attānaṃ anuvatteti, te ca taṃ anuvattantī”ti. Yadi pana karadhātu
analyzed: tat hi te rūpa ggahaṇe attānam anuvatteti te ca tam anuvattanti iti yadi pana kara dhātu

original: dvikammako, evaṃ sante “brahmadatto rajjaṃ kāretī”tiādīsu laddhakāritapaccayattā

analyzed: kārā iti ādīhi padehi tikammakehi yeva bhavitabbanti na niyama abhāvataḥ tādisassa

original: ca payogassa vohārapathe anāgatattā.
analyzed: ca payogassa vohāra pathe anāgata ttā

original: Kaṭṭhaṃ purisena aṅgāraṃ kataṃ. Suvaṇṇaṃ kammārena kaṭakaṃ kataṃ, dāsī sāmikena adāsiṃ
analyzed: kaṭṭham purisena aṅgāram katam suvaṇṇam kammārena kaṭakam katam dāsī sāmikena a dāsim

analyzed: nayaḥ aññatra api upaparikkhitvā yathāsambhavam netabbaḥ karotissa

original: Vahiādīnaṃ payoge rājapurisā rathaṃ gāmaṃ vahanti. Ayaṃ rājā maṃ nāmaṃ pucchati.
analyzed: payoge rāja purisāḥ ratham gāmam vahanti ayam rājā mam nāmam pucchati

original: Parābhavantaṃ purisaṃ, mayaṃ pucchāma gotamaṃ. Āyasmā upāli āyasmatā mahākassapena
analyzed: parābhavantam purisam mayam pucchāma gotamam āyasmai upāli āyasmatā mahākassapena

original: vinayaṃ puṭṭho. Devadatto rājānaṃ kambalaṃ yācati. Te maṃ asse ayācisuṃ. Dhanaṃ taṃ
analyzed: vinayam puṭṭhaḥ devadattaḥ rājānam kambalam yācati te mam asse ayācisum dhanam tam

original: tāta yācati. Brāhmaṇo nāgaṃ maṇiṃ yācati. Nāgo maṇiṃ yācito brāhmaṇena brahmunā āyācito

original: nīto. Mutto campeyyako nāgo, rājānaṃ etadabravi.
analyzed: nītaḥ muttaḥ campeyyakaḥ nāgaḥ rājānam etat abravi

original: Ettha rājānanti mukhyato kammaṃ vuttaṃ. Etanti guṇato. Tathā rājānanti akathitakammaṃ
analyzed: ettha rājānanti mukhyatas kammam vuttam etat ti guṇataḥ tathā rājānanti a kathita kammam

analyzed: vuttam etat ti kathita kammam esa nayaḥ aññatra api upaparikkhitvā yathāraham yojetabbo

original: Evameva “brūhi bhagavā”tiādīsu sampadānavisayattā dvikammakabhāvo na labbhati. Bhikkhu
analyzed: evam eva brūhi bhagavā ati ādīsu sampadāna visaya ttā dvikammaka bhāvaḥ na labbhati bhikkhu

analyzed: mahā rājānam dhammam bhaṇati yam mam bhaṇasi sārathi yam mam vadati bhagavantam

original: etadavoca. Pitā puttaṃ bhāsati. Yaṃ maṃ tvaṃ anusāsasi. Sakyā kho pana ambaṭṭha rājānaṃ
analyzed: etat avoca pitā puttam bhāsati yam mam tvam anusāsasi sakyā kho pana ambaṭṭha rājānam

analyzed: rundhati gopālakaḥ dhuttaḥ dhutta janam dhanam jināti ettha ca kam anuttaram ratna varam

original: jināmā”ti puṇṇakajātakapāḷi nidassanaṃ. Tatthāyamattho “mayaṃ janindā kataraṃ rājānaṃ
analyzed: jināma ati nidassanam tattha ayam atthaḥ mayam janindā kataram rājānam

original: anuttaraṃ ratnavaraṃ jināmā”ti. Iṭṭhakāyo pākāraṃ cinoti vaḍḍhakī. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
analyzed: anuttaram ratna varam jināma ati iṭṭha kāyaḥ pākāram cinoti vaḍḍhakī aññāni pi yojetabbāni

original: Ettha keci puccheyyuṃ “gandhakuṭiṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karoti, buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi.
analyzed: ettha keci puccheyyum gandhakuṭim padakkhiṇam karoti buddham saraṇam gacchāmi

original: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretū’ti payogesu kiṃ dvikammakabhāvo labbhatī”ti? Ettha
analyzed: upāsakam mam bhavam gotamaḥ dhāretu uti payogesu kim dvikammaka bhāvaḥ labbhati iti ettha

original: vuccate – “gandhakuṭiṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karotī”ti ettha na labbhati guṇaguṇīnaṃ vasena
analyzed: vuccate gandha kuṭim padakkhiṇam karoti iti ettha na labbhati guṇa guṇīnam vasena

analyzed: gahita ttā buddham saraṇam gacchāmi iti ettha api na labbhati saraṇam iti gacchāmi iti

original: itisaddalopavasena vuttattā. Tathā hi buddhanti upayogavacanaṃ. Saraṇanti paccattavacanaṃ.
analyzed: iti sadda lopa vasena vutta ttā tathā hi buddha nti upayoga vacanam saraṇam ti paccatta vacanam

original: “Buddhaṃ mama saraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ, aghassa tātā hitassa ca vidhātā”ti iminā adhippāyena
analyzed: buddham mama saraṇam parāyaṇam aghassa tātā hitassa ca vidhātā ati iminā adhippāyena

analyzed: bhajāmi sevāmi bujjhāmi iti atthaḥ upāsakam mam bhavam gotamaḥ dhāretu uti ettha pana

original: dvikammakabhāvo labbhatīti vattabbo “maṃ ito paṭṭhāya upāsakaṃ dhāretū”ti atthasambhavato
analyzed: dvi kammaka bhāvaḥ labbhati iti vattabbaḥ mam itas paṭṭhāya upāsakam dhāretu uti attha sambhavato

analyzed: sakyā kho pana ambaṭṭha rājānam okkākam pitāmaham dahanti iti daha dhātu payogena

original: samānattā ca, adhippāyatthato pana “maṃ ‘upāsako me aya’nti dhāretū”ti attho sambhavatīti
analyzed: samāna ttā ca adhippāya tthato pana mam upāsakaḥ me ayanti dhāretu uti atthaḥ sambhavati iti

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ akāritāni dvikammikadhāturūpāni vibhāvitāni.
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam evam a kāritāni dvi kammika dhātu rūpāni vibhāvitāni

original: Iccevamamhehi ādito paṭṭhāya bhagavato sāsanatthaṃ yathāsatti yathābalaṃ dhātuyo

analyzed: ca taṃrūpāni ca tad anurūpehi nānā padehi nānā atthehi nānā nayehi ca yojetvā vibhāvitāni

original: evaṃ vibhāventehipi amhehi tāsaṃ sarūpaparicchedo atthaparicchedo vā na sakkā sabbaso
analyzed: evam vibhāventehi pi amhehi tāsam sarūpa paricchedaḥ attha paricchedaḥ vā na sakkā sabbaso

original: vattuṃ. Tadubhayañhi ko sabbaso vattuṃ sakkhissati aññatra āgamādhigamasampannehi
analyzed: vattum tat ubhayam hi kaḥ sabbasas vattum sakkhissati aññatra āgama adhigama sampannehi

original: pabhinnapaṭisambhidehi mahākhīṇāsavehi.
analyzed: pabhinna paṭisambhidehi mahā khīṇāsavehi

original: Atthātisayayuttāpi, dhātū honti yato tato. Payogatonugantabbā, anekatthā hi dhātavo.
analyzed: attha atisaya yuttā api dhātū honti yatas tatas aneka atthāḥ hi dhātavaḥ

original: Yenekatthadharā caranti vividhā nāthassa pāṭhe vare,
analyzed: caranti vividhāḥ nāthassa pāṭhe vare

original: Tenekatthadharāva honti sahitā nānūpasaggehive;
analyzed: tena ikattha dharāḥ ava honti sahitāḥ

original: Dhātūnaṃ pana tesamatthaparamaṃ khīṇāsave paṇḍite,
analyzed: dhātūnam pana khīṇa āsave paṇḍite

original: Vajjetvā paṭisambhidāmatiyute ko sabbaso bhaṇatīti.
analyzed: vajjetvā paṭisambhidām atiyute kaḥ sabbasas bhaṇati iti

original: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ

original: Kosallatthāya kate saddanītippakaraṇe
analyzed: kosallatthāya kate saddanīti pakaraṇe

original: Sabbagaṇavinicchayo nāma ekūnavīsatimo paricchedo
analyzed: sabbagaṇavinicchayaḥ nāma ekūnavīsatimaḥ paricchedo

original: Saha rūpavibhāvanāya dhātuvibhāvanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: saha rūpa vibhāvanāya dhātu vibhāvanā niṭṭhitā

original: Dhātumālā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: dhātumālā niṭṭhitā
